private void passage1_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Start2"] = new StoryPassage("Start2", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage1_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage1_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("MY FATHER'S WORK");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Choose a Scenario ");
		if (this.Vars.players == 2)
		{
			yield return base.text("for 2 players.");
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 3)
		{
			yield return base.text("for 3 players.");
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 4)
		{
			yield return base.text("for 4 players.");
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 5)
		{
			yield return base.text("for 5 players.");
		}
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("A Time of War", "ATOW-Preparations", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Fear of the Unknown");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The Cost of Disease");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("For an explanation of how to use this Storybook,");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.link("click here.", "StoryBook", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.tracker = 0;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage2_Init()
{
	base.Passages["ATimeofWarIntro"] = new StoryPassage("ATimeofWarIntro", new string[]
	{
		"INTRO"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage2_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage2_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION I: Taking Sides");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My father was a genius! I state this now, not with the naïveté of my initial discovery of his journal, but as a time-tested statement of truth. It is why I pen these words today for posterity and to affirm with deep conviction what some may erroneously refer to as mad science.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("When I first arrived at my father's manor, I carried the same skepticism any normal individual would. Weary as I was from the excursion across the Hungarian plains, the cold, gray walls of the villa with its oppressive iron gates chilled me to my marrow. When the disfigured caretaker — the only person privileged with the knowledge — revealed to me a false door and spiraling staircase that descended to a secret laboratory, the grim discovery did nothing to soothe my nerves. In fact, the sight of jars filled with preserved flesh and the astringent stench of chemicals aggravated my frail state, leaving me to take my suppers in the bedroom for several weeks. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But, it was this same dark discovery that eventually roused me from my illness. For as I pored over the journal bequeathed to me and surveyed page after page of formulaic experimentation, my apprehensions melted. I felt trepidacious, yet unreservedly enthusiastic at the ethical implications of this great task!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Yet even after the disquiet within my soul was relieved, the nearby village rattled my window panes with cacophonous revelry. At first, I kept my visits to the borough brief and infrequent. It seemed that whenever I turned my head I would lock eyes with a cautious observer, and I felt the entire town's steel gaze like daggers tickling the back of my skull. I could only speculate that my siblings endured the same sordid treatment.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was my spouse, using my extended rest to become better acquainted with the village, who explained how spirited political discourse was the source of this commotion. Then I could discern the rally cry of their evening demonstrations as they spoke of disobedience, the end of monarchy, and civil war. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I began to realize the potential boon that war could provide for my research. If the people shared a mere fraction of the passion that now stoked the fires of my heart, how easily they would embrace my scientific assistance! While my father's ambitions were strong, his solitary existence had doomed his ideas to obscurity. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I would not repeat this error. I would brave the jeers of the populace to guide them in the art of warfare. My efforts would determine the course of this conflict. And when the time comes, it will be my science that will emerge from the flames of war as the true victor!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "IntroConflict", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.rumblings = 0;
	this.Vars.war = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2
	});
	this.Vars.warwinner = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"Separatists",
		"Unified Monarchists"
	});
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Separatists")
	{
		this.Vars.crest = "Sickle";
		this.Vars.warloser = "Unified Monarchists";
		this.Vars.figure = "Shield";
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.crest = "Shield";
		this.Vars.warloser = "Separatists";
		this.Vars.figure = "Sickle";
	}
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Separatists")
	{
		this.Vars.quarter = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"yes",
			"no"
		});
	}
	this.Vars.crazy = 0;
	this.Vars.barracksact = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"mean",
		"nice"
	});
	this.Vars.sep = 0;
	this.Vars.mon = 0;
	this.Vars.gunsbonus = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage3_Init()
{
	base.Passages["TITLE SCREEN"] = new StoryPassage("TITLE SCREEN", new string[]

		"NOTADDED"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage3_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage3_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("MY FATHER'S WORK");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A clever game by");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("T. C. Petty III.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.players = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("How many individuals will be sharing this experience today?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00001"))
	{
		yield return base.link("2 Players.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00001", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage3_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00002"))
	{
		yield return base.link("3 Players.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00002", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage3_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00003"))
	{
		yield return base.link("4 Players.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00003", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage3_Fragment_2), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00004"))
	{
		yield return base.link("5 Players.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00004", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage3_Fragment_3), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage4_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Scoring");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Each Estate Upgrade is worth 1VP.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Add any additional points from Vanity Estate Upgrades.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Score -3VP for any Maladjustments gained at the End of this Generation.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.tmmasterwork == "yes")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Time Machine:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("If the player with the Time Machine Masterwork has not completed it, they must lose 5VP.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE PLAYER WITH THE MOST POINTS IS THE WINNER OF THE GAME.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00005"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to tabulate scores for posterity...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00005", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage4_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage5_Init()

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage5_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("TAKING SIDES - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 1;
	if (this.Vars.rumblings == 0 || this.Vars.rumblings == "")
	{
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "S3_ScenarioIcon";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Turn to the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("A Time of War");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" section of the Village Chronicle. Then, turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" (this is noted by the matching A Time of War symbol: ");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ScenarioIcon\" index=0>)");
			yield return base.text(". Retrieve the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Flag");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" tokens. Retrieve the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WoodenFigureToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(", ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ShieldToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(", and ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_SickleToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" tokens.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Place the Suspicion Marker on space ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				if (this.Vars.players == 2)
				{
					this.Vars.tracker = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						4,
						5,
						6
					});
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 3)
				{
					this.Vars.tracker = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						6,
						7,
						8
					});
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 4)
				{
					this.Vars.tracker = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						7,
						8,
						9
					});
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 5)
				{
					this.Vars.tracker = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						9,
						10,
						11
					});
				}
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.tracker);
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" and the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" Marker one space to the left. Give the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Start Player");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" marker to ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				if (this.Vars.players == 2)
				{
					yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						this.Vars.nameA,
						this.Vars.nameB
					}));
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 3)
				{
					yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						this.Vars.nameA,
						this.Vars.nameB,
						this.Vars.nameC
					}));
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 4)
				{
					yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						this.Vars.nameA,
						this.Vars.nameB,
						this.Vars.nameC,
						this.Vars.nameD
					}));
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 5)
				{
					yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						this.Vars.nameA,
						this.Vars.nameB,
						this.Vars.nameC,
						this.Vars.nameD,
						this.Vars.nameE
					}));
				}
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Town Hall - Political Rumblings");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("When you visit the Town Hall, you may trade a Knowledge cube you have in your Quarters for any other Knowledge cube from the supply. You may perform this trade as many times as you like. ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("There is no additional cost to visit the Town Hall if a token is already on that location.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("In addition, you will speak with the people to more fully understand the political climate. ");
		yield return base.link("Click here whenever you visit the Town Hall.", "RumorD", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Second Round - Pledge of Support");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The village is at a crossroads in this emerging conflict and will need to make a decision. At the end of the Middle Years there will be a special event. ");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000005"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the end of the round to move to the next round...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000005", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage5_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage5_Fragment_0()

}

private void passage6_Init()
{
	base.Passages["RumorD"] = new StoryPassage("RumorD", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage6_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage6_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Visit the Town Hall");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I decided to attend one of several scheduled city council meetings at the Town Hall. ");
	yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"For such a small, rural village, the atmosphere was always busy with at least one boisterous argument erupting after the charged words of a townsperson. This lively arrangement intrigued me, and I decided to investigate further.",
		"While the sights - and smells - of the local civic establishment were certainly an interesting diversion, I could not allow myself to be distracted. I was here to gain insight on the political factions, as I was well-aware that this knowledge could be swung to my advantage.",
		"I was never quite fond of my visits to this place. However, it was ever my duty to make an appearance and my spouse insisted that I would do well to 'mingle' amongst the folk here. So, I made do within the strained situation and struck up a conversation with the first individual that intrigued me.",
		"These spirited events - possible more entertaining to observe than to engage with - took place as the sun set and then sprawled late into the evening. I found myself much more accepted in this environment as the night wore on and inevitably the spirits of all in attendance were roused by the spirits from a local distillery. On this peculiar evening, a few persons caught my eye."
	}));
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.rumblings = int.Parse(this.Vars.rumblings) + 1;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("<b>I chose to converse with:</b>");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.rumor = this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2,
		3,
		4,
		5,
		6
	});
	if (this.Vars.rumor1 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.rumor = this.Vars.rumor - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			1
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.rumor2 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.rumor = this.Vars.rumor - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			2
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.rumor6 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.rumor = this.Vars.rumor - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			6
		});
	}
	this.Vars.rumor = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.rumor
	});
	this.Vars.opt1 = this.Vars.rumor["1st"];
	this.Vars.opt2 = this.Vars.rumor["2nd"];
	if (this.Vars.opt1 == 1)
	{
		yield return base.link("A guard dressed in military regalia near the front door.", "RumorD1", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt1 == 2)
	{
		yield return base.link("A distinguished gentleman near the stage; his whiskers well-waxed.", "RumorD2", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt1 == 5)
	{
		yield return base.link("A somber elderly woman sitting amongst the crowd.", "RumorD3", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt1 == 4)
	{
		yield return base.link("A spirited group of concerned citizens.", "RumorD4", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt1 == 3)
	{
		yield return base.link("A hunched figure with a broken front-tooth, observing with mirth from the shadows.", "RumorD5", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt1 == 6)
	{
		yield return base.link("A conservatively dressed woman shuffling papers in her lap.", "RumorD6Guns", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.opt2 == 1)
	{
		yield return base.link("A guard dressed in military regalia near the front door.", "RumorD1", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt2 == 2)
	{
		yield return base.link("A distinguished gentleman near the stage; his whiskers well-waxed.", "RumorD2", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt2 == 5)
	{
		yield return base.link("A somber elderly woman sitting amongst the crowd.", "RumorD3", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt2 == 4)
	{
		yield return base.link("A spirited group of concerned citizens.", "RumorD4", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt2 == 3)
	{
		yield return base.link("A hunched figure with a broken front-tooth, observing with mirth from the shadows.", "RumorD5", null);
	}
	if (this.Vars.opt2 == 6)
	{
		yield return base.link("A conservatively dressed woman shuffling papers in her lap.", "RumorD6Guns", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage7_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("TAKING SIDES - Middle Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 2;
	this.Vars.nomore = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Town Hall - Political Rumblings");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("When you visit the Town Hall, you may trade a Knowledge cube you have in your Quarters for any other Knowledge cube from the supply. You may perform this trade as many times as you like. ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{

		}

	}
	styleScope = null;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage9_Fragment_0()
{
	string text = (this.Vars.barracks != "yes") ? ((this.Vars.gunsbonus == 0) ? ((this.Vars.war == 1) ? "Warwarn" : "TowardsWar") : "SeedGUNS") : "TSBarracksPenalty";
	if (text == "Warwarn")
	{
		if (this.Vars.townname == "Paradox")
		{
			this.Vars.war = 1;
		}
		if (this.Vars.townname == "Destruction")
		{
			this.Vars.war = 2;
		}
	}
	PassageTracker.instance.CheckProgress("TakeSides3", text);
	yield break;
}

		});
	}

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage12_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully pick up this Storybook device and do not allow any other players to see the screen.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000012"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Once you are ready, click here to reveal your secret conversation.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000012", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage12_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Separatists")
	{
		this.Vars.sep = "win";
	}
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
	{
		this.Vars.sep = "lose";
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage14_Init()
{
	base.Passages["TowardsWar"] = new StoryPassage("TowardsWar", new string[]
	{
		"END"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage14_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage14_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Town Fully Defended");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	string arg = "Remove all player pieces from the board and perform the End of the Generation. Return any unused <sprite=\"S3_SickleToken\" index=0>, <sprite=\"S3_ShieldToken\" index=0>, and <sprite=\"S3_WoodenFigureToken\" index=0> tokens to the Scenario box.";
	Action<string, int> s_OnEndOfGeneration = ViewEndOfGeneration.S_OnEndOfGeneration;
	if (s_OnEndOfGeneration != null)
	{
		s_OnEndOfGeneration(arg, 3);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("have pushed the battlefront away from our fair village and taken command of the local government. ");
	if (this.Vars.barracks == "no")
	{
		yield return base.text("Against my wishes, the Barracks was built by the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(", further strengthening their position in the region.");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("It seems that my progeny will need to be more forceful in the direction of this conflict.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.barracks == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("True to our instructions, the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Barracks");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" was built by the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(", further strengthening their position in the region. Although, I will not see the end of this conflict in my lifetime, due to my efforts, this esteemed and instrumental legacy will continue.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It is fitting that I came mewling into this cold world, struggling each day against the ignorance of men, and now I make my exit amidst this turmoil. For it is only through struggle and remorseless ambition that one can claw their way into the annals of history!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Separatists")
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "IntroMartial-Separatists", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "IntroMartial-Monarchists", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.text(" ");

	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("token into their fist and secretly chooses a side. When all players have chosen, simultaneously reveal your votes.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{

	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage17_Main()
{

		yield return base.text("Tides of War 2 - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.late = 0;
	this.Vars.round = 4;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.pg13 == 0 || this.Vars.pg13 == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}

			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle. Flip your Masterwork Experiment face-down; it cannot be completed during this Generation. Return the <sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0> token 1 space to the left of the Suspicion Marker.");
			if (this.Vars.players == 3)
			{
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3 player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Each player retrieves their second Caretaker from Lost and places it in their Estate. ");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("This piece represents your parent working on Experiments in the lab.");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Paradox Explanation");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;

	{
		yield return base.text("For more detailed rules on Experiments with Paradox tokens ");

		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and how to complete them, ");
		yield return base.link("click here.", "ParadoxExReminder", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Paradoxical Mending Reward");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Fixing the timestream has its rewards. The first player with ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("zero");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Paradox tokens ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ParadoxToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" on their Experiments must immediately ");
			yield return base.link("click here to receive a special bonus.", "TriggerParadox", null);
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("You must remove at least 1 ");
				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ParadoxToken\" index=0>");
				yield return base.text(" token to gain this bonus.");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000017"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the end of the round to move to the next round...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000017", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage17_Fragment_0), false));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage18_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Tides of War 2 - Late Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 6;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.barracks == "no")
	{
		if (this.Vars.pg14 == 0 || this.Vars.pg14 == "")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("SETUP");
				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
				this.Vars._SetupImage = "VillageChronicleCover";
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("14");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle.");
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Military Demands");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Before the end of the Generation, all players must take an action at the Barracks to aide in the war effort. You receive ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("no");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" benefit for this placement.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("If you do not have a piece of your color on the Barracks at the End of the Generation, you will ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("lose 5VP");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.tmrepair == "no")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Repair the Time Machine");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("When taking the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Perform Experiment");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" action, a player may instead complete the requirements for a ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Time Machine Repairs");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Experiment. They gain the VP and bonus listed and then flip the card face-down. ");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Once all ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("three");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Repairs are completed, ");
			yield return base.link("click here for a special message!", "ATimeMachineRepaired", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Paradox Explanation");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("For more detailed rules on Experiments with Paradox tokens ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ParadoxToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and how to complete them, ");
		yield return base.link("click here.", "ParadoxExReminder", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.ttset == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Paradoxical Mending Reward");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Fixing the timestream has its rewards. The first player with ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("zero");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Paradox tokens ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ParadoxToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" on their Experiments must immediately ");
			yield return base.link("click here to receive a special bonus.", "TriggerParadox", null);
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("You must remove at least 1 ");
				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ParadoxToken\" index=0>");
				yield return base.text(" token to gain this bonus.");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		if (this.Vars.late == 2)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000001800"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click here to determine the Fate of the Town.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000001800", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage18_Fragment_0), false));
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		else
		{
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000001801"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click here to determine the Fate of the Town.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000001801", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage18_Fragment_1), false));
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	{
		"END"

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage19_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Paradox");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.dox = this.macros1.random(1.0, 3.0);
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.dox = this.macros1.random(2.0, 4.0);
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.dox = this.macros1.random(3.0, 5.0);
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.dox = this.macros1.random(4.0, 6.0);
	}
	string arg = "Remove all player pieces from the board and perform the End of a Generation. Return your Masterwork face-up once again. Any <sprite=\"S3_ParadoxToken\" index=0> tokens remaining on your Experiments are moved into your Quarters.";
	Action<string, int> s_OnEndOfGeneration = ViewEndOfGeneration.S_OnEndOfGeneration;
	if (s_OnEndOfGeneration != null)
	{
		s_OnEndOfGeneration(arg, 6);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Time continued on as normal. However, I was unclear as to whether meddling with divine absolutes had altered the reality that I once knew.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Count the total number of ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ParadoxToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("markers left on all players' Experiments: ");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If the number is ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.dox);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("or more, there is a chance that the timeline has been altered. ");
	yield return base.link("Click here to continue", "WarningIntro", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If the number of ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_ParadoxToken\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("tokens remaining is fewer, the timeline appears normal. ");
	yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "Paradoxical", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage22_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.rumor1 == "visited")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("A Messenger Arrives");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("All players may again view the Storybook.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("On a Saturday afternoon, I was hustled to the entryway by my caretaker. A young messenger was nervously tapping her leather boots against the stone. In her left hand was a small figurine in the shape of a ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.crest);
		yield return base.text(", which I had left by the windowsill. Her eyes were scanning the room and she was visibly startled by our speedy return. The caretaker muttered his apologies, calling her a thief, but I calmed his nerves quickly.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The messenger turned and spoke to the player with the ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.crest);
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("\"Which flag do you fly?\" ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Which Flag token do you have face-up?");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Separatists")
		{
			if (this.Vars.takereact == 1)
			{
				yield return base.link("Unified Monarchists.", "Amessyes", null);
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.link("Separatists.", "Amessno", null);
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.link("Separatists.", "Amessyes", null);
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.link("Unified Monarchists.", "Amessno", null);
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.takereact == 1)
		{
			yield return base.link("Separatists.", "Amessyes", null);
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.link("Unified Monarchists.", "Amessno", null);
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.link("Unified Monarchists.", "Amessyes", null);
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.link("Separatists.", "Amessno", null);
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
	{
		yield return base.abort("BarracksSimple1");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("Sabotage1Now");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage23_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Martial Law - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 7;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.martial == 0 || this.Vars.martial == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMob_Icon";
			yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("4");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle. Retrieve the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Temporary Housing");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Estate Upgrades.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Place the Suspicion Marker on space ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				if (this.Vars.Martial1 == 0 || this.Vars.Martial1 == "")
				{
					this.Vars.Martial1 = 1;
					if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
					{
						this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 1;
					}
					else
					{
						this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) - int.Parse(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
						{
							0,
							1
						}));
					}
				}
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.tracker);
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" and the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" Marker one space to the left.");
			if (this.Vars.players == 3)
			{
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3 player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Turn the Tide");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("are desperate for assistance in the failing war effort. You may draw a card from the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Advanced Weaponry");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("deck when taking any action that allows you to draw Experiments. When you complete the Experiment you will receive ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("tokens equal to the amount listed at the bottom of the card, and also ");
		if (this.Vars.warloser == "Separatists")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("gain a Knowledge of your choice from the supply");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
		}
		else
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("gain $2 from the supply");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
		}
		yield return base.text("as a gift from the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.martweapons == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Weapons Bonus");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The first player to complete ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("2 Advanced Weaponry");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Experiments ");
			yield return base.link("clicks here for a special bonus.", "PackingHeat1", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			}

		}
		styleScope = null;

			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("When placing a piece on the Barracks, you receive ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("no bonus");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Separatists")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{

		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("tokens for goods. ");

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield break;

	}

private void passage28_Init()
{
	base.Passages["ParadoxIntro"] = new StoryPassage("ParadoxIntro", new string[]
	{
		"INTRO"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage28_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage28_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION III: You Cant Stop Progress");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Brighter Future");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While the discovery of my family's experiments and journals would cement my scientific ambitions for years to come, I had never actually met them. I was too young to remember the disappearance of my brilliant progenitor. To lose a parent and then another to the subsequent dementia that followed was more folly than one child should ever have to bear. I was shielded from this reality, rushed away to Vienna, where I was consumed by my studies until my twenty-first year. It was only at my partner's insistence that I decided to settle my inheritance.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I remember being stunned as I arrived by train on a mid-summer's evening. I do not know what I expected from the anecdotes my nanny had relayed to me, but it  was not the bustling cityscape that greeted me. As the sun dipped into the forest, the glimmer of modern steel light fixtures amplified the urban luminescence. My delighted spouse and I enjoyed a quiet ride in our steamer car, which offered us a chance to observe the idyllic community and decidedly pleasant folk enjoying the convenience of electricity and steam turbine technology.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The estate appeared untouched by years of vacancy; recently pruned brambles and ivy adorned the iron gate and the expansive grounds were immaculate. A caretaker of great age and a small housekeeping staff greeted us. Although updating the grounds to the more modern standard of the nearby town would prove a daunting task, the servants’ warm reception allayed our remaining anxieties. Upon discovery of my family's laboratory, what had been planned as a mere visit received an indefinite extension.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("When I spoke of my family's history of experimentation, I was rarely met with indifference but more often firm words of encouragement. It appeared that this region, so rife with abnormal progress, viewed my theories as rudimentary but delightfully avant-garde. Even when I expounded upon dark rituals and the grotesque, they encouraged further exploration and referred me to the newly constructed University.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This caused me severe consternation. Was this not what I wanted — a clear path towards scientific enlightenment and support of my family's landmark ideas? Why did their lack of friction vex me so? Did they view my illustrious work as trivial? ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was this grim realization that strengthened my will. If these craven modernists wanted more, then so be it! I would push the limits of science further than ever before and damn the consequences!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to Continue...", "TimeTravelEvent", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.townname == "debug")
	{
		yield return base.text("v1.0");
	}
	this.Vars.accolade = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		12,
		13
	});
	this.Vars.timemistake = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2,
		3,
		4,
		5,
		6,
		7,
		8
	});
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage29_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Forward to Progress - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 10;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.pgGen3 == 0 || this.Vars.pgGen3 == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "VillageChronicleCover";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("15");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle.");
			if (this.Vars.players == 3)
			{
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3 player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
			}
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Science At any Cost");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Ignore any ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("icons. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.figure);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token remains in the same spot for the entire Generation. The first time each player reaches or exceeds the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage31_Main()

	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;

With lanterns held high, my cousins and I crept forward into the darkened mineshaft, following the curve of iron tracks to an alcove where warning signs had been posted by the last workers years ago.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As we approached, a metal box began to hum. Blue sparks crackled from the edges of the box, fully illuminating the cave. With a sudden flash, a door on the metal device swung open and thick fog cascaded along the rails. Coincidentally, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("leather seats were situated against the interior walls of the machine. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Without a moment's deliberation, we ambled through the entrance and buckled ourselves in. As we each tightened the buckles about us, we heard a loud hissing sound like the escaping of steam through unseen vents, and the door slammed shut. The metallic walls shook violently, jolting us against our constraints.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A set of dials spun individually, settling on the number ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("1831");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("while reality folded like a silk curtain around us.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to travel through time and space...", "TimeMachineExperiment", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage36_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Martial Law - Late Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 9;
	this.Vars.sabotagee1 = "none";
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.martial <= 2 && this.Vars.warpage2 == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "VillageChronicleCover";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("One of the buildings in town was targeted by the ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
			yield return base.text(". Turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.sabpage);
				yield return base.text(".");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Turn the Tide");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("are desperate for assistance in the failing war effort. You may draw a card from the Advanced Weaponry deck when taking any action that allows you to draw Experiments. When you complete the Experiment you will receive ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("tokens equal to the amount listed at the bottom of the card, and also ");
		if (this.Vars.warloser == "Separatists")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("gain a Knowledge of your choice from the supply");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		else
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("gain $2 from the supply");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("as a gift from the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.martweapons == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))

			}

		}

			}

			yield return base.link("clicks here for a special bonus.", "PackingHeat1", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists" && this.Vars.bldg1 != "Barracks")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

				}

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			yield return base.text("The Monarchy demands a commitment of service from their citizenry. At the end of each round, if a player has not placed a piece on the Barracks, a penalty will be enacted upon them. This penalty will be determined by the Monarchy at the end of each round.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("When placing a piece on the Barracks, you receive ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.moninc3);
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}

	}

				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			}
			styleScope = null;

		}

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000036"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the End of the Generation to determine the Fate of the Town...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000036", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage36_Fragment_0), false));

	}

	yield break;
	yield break;

	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage41_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage41_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION III: Heavy is the Crown");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Influence is gained in two ways: through money (that alluring and insidious scratch) and through bloodshed. Though my years on this foul Earth are few, in this abbreviated time I have learned this one valuable truth.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The voracious objections of the townsfolk had become so commonplace that to see them reduced to sneering murmurs was a marked improvement that made my excursions to the village supremely more tolerable. The Separatist movement had dissipated with time, which put an end to this exasperating (yet lucrative) warring business and the peasantry returned to their normal state of impotent discontent.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("By this time, our family's influence had bent the ear of the throne. With keen use of investment capital, we were afforded an advisory position that could be employed to sway official opinion and deal with regional matters. This presented a delicate balance: As long as our work went unnoticed, we could avoid all consequences and remain influential. Once noticed, however, we could never return to the same peace once afforded. Heavy is the head that wears the crown, as the bard says.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I was excited at the proposition, and instructed my servants to be at their finest for potential visitors; because while I grew lethargic at the thought of entertaining clerical matters of the crown, I fully recognized the power that one could wield with proper control of the state. And whether I had to bury them in gold or watch the rivers run red with blood, I would be afforded that power!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "RoyalBarnCheck", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.townname == "debug")
	{
		yield return base.text("v1.0");
	}
	if (this.Vars.MonarchReignIntro == 0 || this.Vars.MonarchReignIntro == "")
	{
		this.Vars.MonarchReignIntro = 1;
		this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) - 1;
		if (this.Vars.players == 5)
		{
			this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) - 1;
		}
	}
	this.Vars.decbon = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		5,
		6,
		7,
		8
	});
	if (this.Vars.warloser == "Unified Monarchists")
	{
		this.Vars.endchange = "yes";
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.commtrigger = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			2,
			3,
			4
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.commtrigger = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			3,
			4,
			5
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.commtrigger = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			4,
			5,
			6
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.commtrigger = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			5,
			6,
			7
		});
	}
	this.Vars.plareigng = 0;
	this.Vars.plbreigng = 0;
	this.Vars.plcreigng = 0;
	this.Vars.pldreigng = 0;
	this.Vars.plereigng = 0;
	this.Vars.plareigne = 0;
	this.Vars.plbreigne = 0;
	this.Vars.plcreigne = 0;
	this.Vars.pldreigne = 0;
	this.Vars.plereigne = 0;
	this.Vars.advisorcount = 0;
	this.Vars.crowncount = 0;
	this.Vars.reignsep = 0;
	this.Vars.weaponrew = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage42_Init()

	{
		"INTRO"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage42_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage42_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION III - Peace Through War");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I arrived just in time for the festivities. The normally dour gothic architecture was festooned with brightly colored ribbons, balloons, and pots overflowing with borscht. The conquering soldiers paraded down the cobblestone streets in formation and uniform, ticker tape celebrating the Separatists’ victory. Such a remarkable contrast between the slipshod militias of my youth and the democratic revolutionaries cheering the Hungarian name in time with each stomp of a soldier's boot.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, it was not this boring pageantry that ignited an infernal passion within me, it was the passion of the people. Emboldened by their conquest of a royal power and enlivened with pride in their country, this righteous fervor became a frenzy. Within weeks, an extreme nationalist party began to take hold and this brief respite from war was suddenly punctuated by lofty ambitions. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The government had realized that the only way to ensure a lasting peace in the country and the tumultuous surrounding territories was to properly exercise military force to coerce cooperation. My family's reputation within the scientific community had positioned me as the foremost authority in experimental weaponry. I relished the opportunity to observe the devastative effects of these marvelous machinations by attempting to take over the world.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With my technological arsenal leading the charge, no nation could hope to resist our power! Our army would ensure a lasting peace that would enshrine my legacy forever in the annals of human history. There was not a moment to waste! It was time to change the world with science!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "SeparatistBarnCheck", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.townname == "debug")
	{
		yield return base.text("v1.0");
	}
	this.Vars.wlimit = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		4,
		5
	});
	if (this.Vars.warloser == "Separatists")
	{
		this.Vars.endchange = "yes";
	}
	this.Vars.pea1 = 0;
	this.Vars.pea2 = 0;
	this.Vars.pea3 = 0;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage44_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("World Conquest - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 19;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.pea1 == 0 || this.Vars.pea1 == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMob_Icon";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("11");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle. ");
			if (this.Vars.wardestroy >= 1)
			{
				yield return base.text("Each player ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("pays $1");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" in estate tax to the supply.");
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Place the Suspicion Marker on space ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				if (this.Vars.Peace1 == 0 || this.Vars.Peace1 == "")
				{
					this.Vars.Peace1 = 1;
					this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 1;
					if (this.Vars.players == 4)
					{
						this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 1;
					}
					if (this.Vars.players == 5)
					{
						this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 2;
					}
				}
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.tracker);
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" and the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" Marker one space to the left.");
			if (this.Vars.players == 3)
			{
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3 player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
			}
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Separatist Allegiance");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("If a player does ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("NOT");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("have a Separatists Flag token face-up, their ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Self");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("piece only takes an action ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("once");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("when visiting a Town Location.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("War on the World");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.link("For an explanation of war, click here...", "HowtoWar", null);
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The Empire has decided to expand by utilizing the implements of destruction which you have provided. You may draw a card from the Advanced Weaponry deck when taking any action that allows you to draw Experiments. When you complete the Experiment, you will receive ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("tokens equal to the amount listed at the bottom of the card.");

	styleScope = null;

		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))

			{
				yield return base.text("Everything is a Weapon");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("When performing an Experiment, you may substitute 1 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token for any 1 required Ingredient. ");
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("You may only do this once per Experiment.");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))

	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000044"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the end of the Round...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000044", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage44_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage50_Main()

	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;

	{
		yield return base.text("A Modern Future");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While the discovery of my family's experiments and journals would cement my scientific ambitions for years to come, I had never actually met them. I was too young to remember the disappearance of my brilliant progenitor. To lose a parent and then another to the subsequent dementia that followed was more folly than one child should ever have to bear. I was shielded from this reality, rushed away to Vienna, where I was consumed by my studies until my twenty-first year. It was only at my partner's insistence that I decided to settle my inheritance.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I remember being stunned as I arrived by train on a mid-summer's evening. I do not know what I expected from the anecdotes my nanny had relayed to me, but it  was not the bustling cityscape that greeted me. As the sun dipped into the forest, the glimmer of modern steel light fixtures amplified the urban luminescence. My delighted spouse and I enjoyed a quiet ride in our steamer car which offered us a chance to observe the idyllic community and decidedly pleasant folk enjoying the convenience of electricity and steam turbine technology.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The estate appeared untouched by years of vacancy; recently pruned brambles and ivy adorned the iron gate and the expansive grounds were immaculate. A caretaker of great age and a small housekeeping staff greeted us. Although updating the grounds to the more modern standard of the nearby town would prove a daunting task, the servants’ warm reception allayed our remaining anxieties. Upon discovery of my family's laboratory, what had been planned as a mere visit received an indefinite extension.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, when I spoke of my family's history of experimentation, I was rarely met with indifference but more often firm words of encouragement. It appeared that this region, so rife with abnormal progress, viewed my theories as rudimentary but delightfully avant-garde. Even when I expounded upon dark rituals and the grotesque, they encouraged further exploration and referred me to the newly constructed University.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This caused me severe consternation. Was this not what I wanted — a clear path towards scientific enlightenment and support of my family's landmark ideas? Why did their lack of friction vex me so? Did they view my illustrious work as trivial? ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was this grim realization that strengthened my will. If these craven modernists wanted more, then so be it! I would push the limits of science further than ever before and damn the consequences!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("  ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.total = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		6,
		7,
		8,
		9,
		10
	});
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.total = int.Parse(this.Vars.total) - 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.total = int.Parse(this.Vars.total) - 2;
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.total = int.Parse(this.Vars.total) - 3;
	}
	this.Vars.search = 0;
	this.Vars.stasis = "no";
	this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End4";
	this.Vars.master = 0;
	if (this.Vars.crazy >= 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00016"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00016", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage50_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "Late2ResB", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.townname == "debug")
	{
		yield return base.text("v1.0");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}
