	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("In a brief instant, the trajectory of the universe shifted. I am not sure if anyone will ever read these words, as even now they flutter in and out of existence on the page.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While enjoying a friendly sitting room conversation in the company of my cousins, our teacups were rattled by some unknown force. With a blinding flash, a curious, metal, box-like device appeared before us, sparks and embers swirling in the resultant wall of dust.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Suddenly, the door burst open and the body of a reptilian beast sliced through the fog; its eyes a glossy white. It fell to the singed carpet, lifeless, it's neck sliced open yet cauterized, though a fresh burst of dark blood pooled onto the stone beneath it. Could it be? A dinosaur?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A white-haired woman emerged from the chemical mist, clutching her side. The elderly lady was dressed in metallic attire that was both intriguing and exotic. The shiny material was frayed as though some impossibly large claws had shredded it, while splatters of liquid (much of it dark red) adorned her outfit. Behind her, ");
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text("another scientist");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		yield return base.text("two other scientists");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		yield return base.text("three other scientists");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		yield return base.text("four other scientists");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("sat, tethered to their seats by firm belts.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Strained words issued from her lips: \"Thank god I've found you! You must close the time loop. Oh, how brash we were! To assume we could tamper with fourth-dimensional forces! Our miscalculation will now be your doom. Soon, time as we know it will cease to exist.\" She beckoned to us, but her gaunt features paled when the room was suddenly cast in a crimson glow.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("\"I am too late! It's already happening!\" she screamed, before the world reformed itself around her.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "TimeWarp1st", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage54_Init()
{
	base.Passages["TimeWarp"] = new StoryPassage("TimeWarp", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage54_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage54_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Time Shifts");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"I could see a rift - a shimmering slice in the fabric of time -  open up before me.",
		"After conducting my business, I felt the Earth tremble beneath my feet. My blood vessels pulsed, bulging varicose above my straining muscles as an unseen force seemed to press upon me.",
		"A bolt of lightning carved through the pathway ahead, sending my carriage to an abrupt halt. The air swirled into a violent tornado around me.",
		"My stomach fell. A lump caught in my throat."
	}));
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.twcode = this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
	{
		17,
		18,
		19,
		20,
		21,
		22
	});
	if (this.Vars.cont == 17)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			17
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 18)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			18
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 19)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			19
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 20)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			20
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 21)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			21
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 22)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			22
		});
	}
	this.Vars.twcode = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.twcode
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The sky cast a crimson glow upon the stone walls of my estate. I felt the air crackle with energy once again.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0005402"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0005402", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage54_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage54_Fragment_0()
{
	if (this.Vars.search >= this.Vars.total)
	{
		this.Vars.cont = this.Vars.twcode["1st"];
		yield return base.abort("WarningEvent2");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 14)
	{
		this.Vars.cont = this.Vars.twcode["1st"];
		yield return base.abort("Warning2");
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.cont = this.Vars.twcode["1st"];
		yield return base.abort("Warning3");
	}
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage54_Fragment_1()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.cont = this.Vars.twcode["1st"];
	if (this.Vars.search >= this.Vars.total)
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "WarningEvent2";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 14)
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Warning2";
	}
	else
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Warning3";
	}
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "ScoreTrackMarker";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Lost in Time");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- All player pieces are removed from the Town board and placed in Lost.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The player who took the action that triggered this Time Shift ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("gains ");
			yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 2.0));
			yield return base.text("VP");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{

			yield return base.text("Utopian Experiment");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("2 additional VP");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000060"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the End of the Generation for Final Scoring and to determine the Fate of the Town.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000060", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage60_Fragment_0), false));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage61_Main()

The time-loop had been closed.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End3";
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage62_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION II: A Return to Devastation");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I hope you will indulge my brief melancholic digression, for even my stern disposition was reduced to sobbing when I discovered the grim remnants of what was once a burgeoning village. I knew of the tragedy, having received several letters urging me to delay my visit until the conflict had been resolved. However, I felt compelled to see the destruction with my own eyes, and even braved the last vestiges of war to do so. If only I had taken heed of their warning...");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The all-encompassing destruction had blackened the fields, leaving the land ashen and emaciated. The once-grand estate was now in shambles; a dilapidated husk of its former intimidating presence. I wept for what seemed like hours amongst the dust and rubble. While I was still heir to a considerable fortune with diverse business interests, I was struck by the sentimental weight of such a loss.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, fortune would soon shine its myriad gaze upon me.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I was joined by my cousins and we shared our grief at a hotel in Budapest for several days. It was there that an unexpected messenger arrived with a small brown package. Inside, the executor of our parents’ affairs had included the remaining articles of interest salvaged from the mansion. As if preserved for this moment, there was a leather journal seemingly untouched by the flames. Upon opening the tome, a weathered sheet of parchment fell to the table. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was a map!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.buy = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "TimeTravelIntro2", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.takereact == 1)
	{
		if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Separatists")
		{
			this.Vars.warwinner = "Unified Monarchists";
		}
		else if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
		{
			this.Vars.warwinner = "Separatists";
		}
		if (this.Vars.warloser == "Separatists")
		{
			this.Vars.warloser = "Unified Monarchists";
		}
		else if (this.Vars.warloser == "Unified Monarchists")
		{
			this.Vars.warloser = "Separatists";
		}
	}
	this.Vars.tmrepair = "no";
	this.Vars.pgGen3 = 0;
	this.Vars.pg13 = 0;
	this.Vars.buy = 0;
	this.Vars.master = 0;
	this.Vars.ttset = 0;
	this.Vars.pg14 = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

			yield return base.link("To blame " + this.Vars.nameD + ".", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00050", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage65_Fragment_24), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

		}

		yield return base.text(" ");

		{
			yield return base.link("click here for the negative consequence they must endure.", "1stCrownCons", null);
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.link("click here for the negative consequence they must endure.", "CrownCons", null);
		}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Royal Eye");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Any player with a ");

			yield return base.text(" Marker on their Score Track Marker ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("loses 1VP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" any time they would gain ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.weaponrew == "money")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Weapon Token Bonus");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0> tokens can be spent like money to pay for any costs. Each <sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0> token is worth $1.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	if (this.Vars.weaponrew == "vp")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Weapon Token Bonus");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("While our attempt to influence the military may have been unsuccessful, they are still mildly interested in our research. ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("At Game End, each ");
				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
				yield return base.text(" token is worth 1VP.");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000068"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the end of the round to move to the next round...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000068", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage68_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage68_Fragment_0()
{
	PassageTracker.instance.CheckProgress("MonarchReign2", (this.Vars.advisorcount >= this.Vars.commtrigger) ? "CommemorativeStatueEvent" : "MonarchReign3");
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage69_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Monarchy Reigns - Late Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 18;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.pageturn == "yes")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Commemorative Statue");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage70_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Escalation");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As the war pressed on relentlessly, it was I who suffered most terribly. With embattlements requiring constant provisions, procuring the necessary ingredients for my experiments became increasingly more difficult. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, in my humble brilliance I settled on a firm solution based upon one simple question: Why do I need specialty ingredients when I can just attach guns to everything? ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Certainly this slapdash methodology was not ideal nor dignified, but it certainly achieved a devastative result. Why my first practical demonstration caused both sides to cease hostilities after witnessing a small battalion reduced to a mere wine stain upon the battlefield.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, the regional military factions required additional convincing as the use of our weapons was still considered a \"war crime\" and would require further convincing to employ these additional methods. Imagine, \"science\" being considered a war crime? Is it not a general's hope to reach an efficient victory? ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "MartialSepEventa", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage71_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Deploying Advanced Weaponry");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("At the end of each round, players will use their ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("tokens to bid on ");
	if (this.Vars.players <= 3)
	{
		yield return base.text("two");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players >= 4)
	{
		yield return base.text("three");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("battlefields that increase in value. ");
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text("The first Battle of each round is worth 2VP and the second is worth 3VP.");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		yield return base.text("The first Battle of each round is worth 3VP and the second is worth 5VP.");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players >= 4)
	{
		yield return base.text("The first Battle of each round is worth 2VP, the second is worth 3VP, and the third is worth 5VP.");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("During the Late Years, the Final Battles will be worth double the VP.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("To Battle");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("All players take all their ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("tokens into their hands. For each battle, starting with the upper-most territory (marked by the Occult cube), players secretly decide how many tokens to place into their right hand and extend their fist to the center of the table. Once all players have decided, all players reveal their tokens.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The player(s) who revealed the most tokens receives the VP listed. If more than one player revealed the same amount, all players that revealed the most tokens receive all points. ");
	if (this.Vars.peac == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text("For the Final Battle, the Battle card will be turned to the opposite ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Final Battle");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" side. For this battle, ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("each territory is worth additional points.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
	}
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("ALL revealed tokens are placed into the supply, no matter the outcome.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This process is then repeated by moving the Occult cube to the next square, until all battles have been resolved.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("You must reveal at least 1 token to receive points. If no player reveals a token, then no players score VP and the next battle begins.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.round == 19)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00051"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to return...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00051", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage71_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 20)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00052"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to return...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00052", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage71_Fragment_1), false));
		}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage72_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Glory and Recognition");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	string str = (this.Vars.players > 4) ? this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		this.Vars.nameA,
		this.Vars.nameB,
		this.Vars.nameC,
		this.Vars.nameD,
		this.Vars.nameE
	}) : ((this.Vars.players > 3) ? this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		this.Vars.nameA,
		this.Vars.nameB,
		this.Vars.nameC,
		this.Vars.nameD
	}) : ((this.Vars.players > 2) ? this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		this.Vars.nameA,
		this.Vars.nameB,
		this.Vars.nameC
	}) : this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		this.Vars.nameA,
		this.Vars.nameB
	})));
	yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"I alone deserved recognition for my glorious, bombastic, chimerical, transformative creations that defied the rigors of known science. I could no longer suffer the egotistical competitive nature of my cousins, whose work so paled in comparison to my own. This was my time. This was the era of " + str + " III!",
		"The fate of the world rested in my hands. It was my discoveries, my ingenious weaponry, my unslakable ambitions that would define this new epoch in human existence. And I put on a demonstration that left no doubt as to whom the glory should be bestowed upon.",
		"Fame meant little to me if it did not carry with it the power to alter the world. I would watch as it transformed - carefully molded by my own hands - into a boundless utopia. My influence could no longer be relegated to the shadows. It was time to claim the Earth for my own and shake it to its very core."
	}));
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("To Battle");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("All players take all their ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("tokens into their hands. For each battle, starting with the upper-most territory (marked by the Occult cube), the players secretly decide how many tokens to place into their right hand and extend their fist to the center of the table. Once all players have decided, all players reveal their tokens.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The player(s) who revealed the most tokens receives the VP listed. If more than one player revealed the same amount, all players that revealed the most tokens receive all points. ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("ALL revealed tokens are placed into the supply, no matter the outcome.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This process is then repeated by moving the Occult cube to the next square, until all battles have been resolved.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("You must reveal at least 1 token to receive points. If no player reveals a token, then no players score VP and the next battle begins.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to begin the battle...", "BattleCompleteReturn", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage73_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Forward to Progress - Middle Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 11;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Science At any Cost");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Ignore any ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("icons. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.figure);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token remains in the same spot for the entire Generation. The first time each player reaches or exceeds the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.figure);
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token, ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
			{
				yield return base.text("they may immediately build a Vanity Estate Upgrade of their choice");
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.text("they may immediately take a Perform Experiment action");
			}
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Technician");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("When visiting the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Technician");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(", you may pay 1 basic Ingredient to gain the matching ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Advanced Ingredient.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("This trade can only be performed once per action.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Utopian Experiments");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A new set of Experiments are available for players to complete. They may be drawn whenever any action would allow a player to draw new Experiments.");

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

	styleScope = null;

			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("at the end of the Generation will gain this tile at no cost. ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("If there is a tie, the one with the fewest VP receives the tile.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.release >= 1)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000007300"))
			{

			}

		}

	styleScope = null;

	yield break;
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage74_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.timemistake < 8)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Monument to Progress");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.release >= 1)
		{
			this.Vars.giants = int.Parse(this.Vars.giants) - 1;
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The town offered a token of their appreciation for setting their trajectory towards a Utopian future.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000074"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000074", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage74_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	if (this.Vars.timemistake == 8)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Rebuilding");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("With no monument built, the remaining people in the region set to the unfortunate task of reconstructing a landscape torn apart by time paradoxes and interdimensional beings.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("It was a bitter pill to swallow. I had done so much; given so much of myself. To receive no reward for offering the gift of time travel to the world - despite the total and utter chaos it affected - tainted my otherwise impeccable reputation.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "Scoring", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		if (this.Vars.giants >= 1)
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End1";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End2";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		if (this.Vars.giants >= 2)
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End1";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End2";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		if (this.Vars.giants >= 3)
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End1";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End2";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		if (this.Vars.giants >= 3)
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End1";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End2";
		}
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage76_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("FINAL BATTLE");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Despite our superior weapon technology and a pioneering reinterpretation of ethics in conflict, some of the neighboring countries still refused to be subjugated. The generals were prepared for a final push which would determine the outcome of the conflict and if this glorious empire would reign above all else.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Battle Reminder");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("All players take all their ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("tokens into their hands. For each battle, starting with the upper-most territory (marked by the Occult cube), players secretly decide how many tokens to place into their right hand and extend their fist to the center of the table. Once all players have decided, all players reveal their tokens.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The player(s) who revealed the most tokens receives the VP listed. If more than one player played the same amount, all players that revealed the most tokens receive all points. ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("ALL revealed tokens are placed into the supply, no matter the outcome.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This process is then repeated by moving the Occult cube to the next square, until all battles have been resolved.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("You must reveal at least 1 token to receive points. If no player reveals a token, then no players score VP and the next battle begins.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.peac == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0007601"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0007601", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage76_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0007603"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0007603", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage76_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

			yield return base.text("SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "DiscardEstateUpgrade_Icon";

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	if (this.Vars.buy == 1)

		}

	{
		this.Vars.blame = this.Vars.nameA;
		this.Vars.late = 1;
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "BlameOut1", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.pl2 > this.Vars.pl1 && this.Vars.pl2 > this.Vars.pl3 && this.Vars.pl2 > this.Vars.pl4 && this.Vars.pl2 > this.Vars.pl5)
	{

		this.Vars.blame = this.Vars.nameE;
		this.Vars.late = 1;
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "BlameOut1";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.pl1 + this.Vars.pl2 + this.Vars.pl3 + this.Vars.pl4 + this.Vars.pl5 == 0)
	{
		this.Vars.blame = "none";
		this.Vars.late = 2;
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "TimeTravel3";
	}
	else
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "BlameOut2";
	}
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "S3_SeparatistToken";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Any player who chose to pay $2 to acquire a Flag token of the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(" pays $2 and flips their token to the opposite side.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	}

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Count up how many ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("Flag tokens total are face-up in all players' Estates. Then count up how many ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("Flag tokens total are face-up in all players' Estates. The army with the most Flag tokens wins the war. ");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("(If there is a tie, the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("win the war.)");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Who won the war?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000009100"))
		{
			yield return base.link("The " + this.Vars.warwinner, null, () => base.enchantHook("h000009100", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage91_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000009101"))
		{
			yield return base.link("The " + this.Vars.warloser, null, () => base.enchantHook("h000009101", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage91_Fragment_1), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000009101"))
		{
			yield return base.link("The " + this.Vars.warwinner, null, () => base.enchantHook("h000009101", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage91_Fragment_1), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage93_Fragment_1()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.crazy > 0)
	{
		if (this.Vars.ParadoxFirstnextPsg == "" || this.Vars.ParadoxFirstnextPsg == 0)
		{
			this.Vars.ParadoxFirstnextPsg = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				"FutureStick",
				"CostStick1"
			});
		}
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = this.Vars.ParadoxFirstnextPsg;
	}
	else
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "MonumentVote";
	}
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "S3_GiantMW";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Retrieve the ");

		{

private void passage109_Init()
{
	base.Passages["TownHallS1"] = new StoryPassage("TownHallS1", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage109_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage109_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand this Storybook device to Player ");
		this.Vars.th = int.Parse(this.Vars.th) + 1;
		if (this.Vars.th == 1)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
		}
		else if (this.Vars.th == 2)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
		}
		else if (this.Vars.th == 3)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
		}
		else if (this.Vars.th == 4)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
		}
		else if (this.Vars.th == 5)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.abort("GunsAnnouncement");
		}
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I decided to converse with:");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.rumor = this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2,
		3,
		4,
		5,
		6
	});
	if (this.Vars.rumor1 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.rumor = this.Vars.rumor - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			1
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.rumor2 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.rumor = this.Vars.rumor - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			2
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.rumor6 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.rumor = this.Vars.rumor - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			6
		});
	}
	this.Vars.rumor = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.rumor
	});
	this.Vars.opt1 = this.Vars.rumor["1st"];
	this.Vars.opt2 = this.Vars.rumor["2nd"];
	if (this.Vars.opt1 == 1)
	{
		yield return base.link("A guard dressed in military regalia near the front door.", "RumorD1", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.opt1 == 2)
	{
		yield return base.link("A distinguished gentleman near the stage; his whiskers well-waxed.", "RumorD2", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.opt1 == 5)
	{
		yield return base.link("A somber elderly woman sitting amongst the crowd.", "RumorD3", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.opt1 == 4)
	{
		yield return base.link("A spirited group of concerned citizens.", "RumorD4", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.opt1 == 6)
	{
		yield return base.link("A conservatively dressed woman shuffling papers in her lap.", "RumorD6Guns", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("A hunched figure with a broken front-tooth, observing with mirth from the shadows.", "RumorD5", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.opt2 == 1)
	{
		yield return base.link("A guard dressed in military regalia near the front door.", "RumorD1", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.opt2 == 2)
	{
		yield return base.link("A distinguished gentleman near the stage; his whiskers well-waxed.", "RumorD2", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.opt2 == 5)
	{
		yield return base.link("A somber elderly woman sitting amongst the crowd.", "RumorD3", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.opt2 == 4)
	{
		yield return base.link("A spirited group of concerned citizens.", "RumorD4", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.opt2 == 3)
	{
		yield return base.link("A hunched figure with a broken front-tooth, observing with mirth from the shadows.", "RumorD5", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("A conservatively dressed woman shuffling papers in her lap.", "RumorD6Guns", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage110_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Paradox Averted");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Intrigued by his forwardness and familiarity, I followed him a few blocks to his home. Upon arrival, he opened the door and pointed to a ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.crest);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("figure. When I reached into my pocket, the same figure was there. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Though my reflexes are exceedingly well-trained, I was caught unprepared when, spying the figure, the man's demeanor suddenly became fiery and with otherworldly speed he snatched it from my hands. As if compelled by an unseen force, he extended the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.crest);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("towards the identical second figure. I witnessed his gloved hand, like a ghostly apparition, transition through it. Suddenly, the two identical pieces merged into one another seamlessly.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The man attempted to pull his fingers away, his entire frame beginning to shake and oscillate with a vicious intensity. I could sense a wave of heat radiating outward from the frightened indvidual, and scarcely shielded my eyes before the skin began to melt from his face like wax from a candle. Seconds later, his entire head exploded, the contents of which forcefully ejected themselves in a thick red ring across the walls of the room.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Certainly a great experiment on time paradoxes had been conducted today - though to what aim it served, I was not exactly certain.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000110"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000110", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage110_Fragment_0), false));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage112_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.war == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("WARNING");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Remove all player pieces from the board when performing the End of the Generation as normal, but do ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("NOT");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" discard your completed Experiments. You will still choose a completed Experiment to Store, but keep all your other completed Experiments nearby. ");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00078"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00078", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage112_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	if (this.Vars.war == 2)
	{
		yield return base.abort("TowardsWar");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage113_Fragment_1()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.twcode = this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
	{
		17,
		18,
		19,
		20,
		21,
		22
	});
	if (this.Vars.cont == 17)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			17
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 18)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			18
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 19)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			19
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 20)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			20
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 21)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			21
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.cont == 22)
	{
		this.Vars.twcode = this.Vars.twcode - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			22
		});
	}
	this.Vars.twcode = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.twcode
	});
	this.Vars.cont = this.Vars.twcode["1st"];
	if (this.Vars.rumor2 == "visited")
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "OldManToken";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.stasis == "yes")
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Warning3time";
	}
	else
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Warning3";
	}
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "GainServantFromLost";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("All players retrieve ALL their pieces from Lost");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("as their servants from the multiverses reappear to provide assistance.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

		yield return base.text("tokens from the Scenario box and place them in a supply nearby.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Any player with a ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token from Generation 1 gains ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("2 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("tokens.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Discard this ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token to the Scenario box.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Then,");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Any player with a face-up Flag token matching the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("gains ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("1 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Any player with a face-up Flag token matching the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("gains ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("2 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("tokens.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.martial = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.bldg1 = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.wardestroy = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.royaladvisor = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage125_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.townname == "Paradox")
	{
		this.Vars.war = 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.townname == "Destruction")
	{
		this.Vars.war = 2;
	}
	if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Knowledge Bonus");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("All players count up the total number of Knowledge cubes remaining in their possession. The player(s) with the most cubes immediately gains a ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" and places it in their Quarters.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000012501"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000012501", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage125_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Ingredient Bonus");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("All players count up the total number of Ingredients remaining in their possession. The player(s) with the most Ingredients immediately gains a ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" and places it in their Quarters.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000012503"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000012503", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage125_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Wealth Bonus");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("All players count up the total number of money remaining in their possession. The player(s) with the most money immediately gains a ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" and places it in their Quarters.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000012505"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000012505", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage125_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Knowledge Bonus");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("All players count up the total number of Knowledge cubes remaining in their possession. The player(s) with the most cubes immediately gains a ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" and places it in their Quarters.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000012504"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000012504", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage125_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage127_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Amassment of Weaponry");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With the glorious schematics made into reality, I was able to test my weapons with great effect on the lands of my estate. However, with each crack of thunderous incendiaries, my bold new vision for modern arms attracted further attention, for better or worse.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Choose the name of the player who completed ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("2 Advanced Weaponry");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("Experiments:");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00081"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameA, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00081", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage127_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00082"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameB, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00082", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage127_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00083"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameC, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00083", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage127_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00084"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameD, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00084", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage127_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 4)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00085"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameE, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00085", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage127_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage128_Fragment_3()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.round == 7)
	{
		this.Vars.martweapons = 1;
		this.Vars.martial = 1;
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Martial1";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 8)
	{
		this.Vars.martweapons = 1;
		this.Vars.martial = 2;
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Martial2";
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.martweapons = 1;
		this.Vars.martial = 3;
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Martial3";
	}
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "Creepy_Icon";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.heat);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("gains ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"1 <sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0> and 1 Resource of their choice.",
			"1 Resource of their choice and moves the <sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0> Marker 1 space to the left."
		}));
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("If they have not already done so, ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.heat);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("may flip their Flag token to the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("side if they wish.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	}

	{
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "Warning3", null);

	{

private void passage131_Init()

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage131_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Military Protection");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("On a brisk April morning, our parents were called upon to attend another Town Hall meeting. Knowing full well the outcome, I summoned my cousins and concocted a simple plan to avoid the same mistake as the past. Using a mercurial and chloroform solution, our families were sufficiently lethargic upon the day in question and could not attend.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("We arrived in their place as surrogates and proceeded to vote counter to what we had before.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.barracks == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("Because of our decision, the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Barracks are not built in town");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(". Whatever escalating tension had occurred in the original timeline was mended, or at least it was dulled.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("Because of our decision, the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Barracks are built in town");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(". Whatever escalating tension had occurred in the original timeline was mended, or at least it was dulled.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "SeedResolution", null);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage134_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Afternoon Tea");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.bldg1 == 0 || this.Vars.bldg1 == "")
	{
		this.Vars.teaopt = "Barracks";
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.teaopt = "Outpost";
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("All players may again view the Storybook.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was absolutely dreadful. Astringent tea from an obscure area of the orient - bitter, stale cranberry scones, wildflower honey, and store-bought cream - this was without question the worst tea party to which I had ever had the displeasure of an invitation. And to think, the Monarchy was responsible for such a wasted afternoon.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("What kind of aristocracy was this? It made me re-evaluate my position entirely. If I could be served indigestible digestives then perhaps I should cause the nobility a little indigestion in response by burning down the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.teaopt);
	yield return base.text("! It would certainly remove the requirement to visit.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, a plan as critical as this one required a conspiracy to execute. Therefore, regretably, the fate of the operation was left to the whims of my family, whom I loved dearly.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "2PAfternoonBid", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "AfternoonTeab", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage136_Fragment_0()
{
	this.Vars.rc = 1;
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		this.Vars.plareigng = int.Parse(this.Vars.plareigng) + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.plbreigng = int.Parse(this.Vars.plbreigng) + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.plcreigng = int.Parse(this.Vars.plcreigng) + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.pldreigng = int.Parse(this.Vars.pldreigng) + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.plereigng = int.Parse(this.Vars.plereigng) + 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("Reign1b");
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage138_Main()
{
	StyleScope styleScope;
	if (this.Vars.benevolent == "good")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Benevolence Bonus");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Iron Fist Bonus");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The player with the most ");
	if (this.Vars.benevolent == "good")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Benevolent");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Iron Fist");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("decrees will now receive a bonus. ");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("If there is a tie, no players will be rewarded.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.benevolent == "good")
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
		yield return base.text(" : ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.plareigng);
		yield return base.text(" Benevolent decrees.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
		yield return base.text(" : ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.plbreigng);
		yield return base.text(" Benevolent decrees.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.players > 2)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
			yield return base.text(" : ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.plcreigng);
			yield return base.text(" Benevolent decrees.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.players > 3)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
			yield return base.text(" : ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.pldreigng);
			yield return base.text(" Benevolent decrees.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.players > 4)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
			yield return base.text(" : ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.plereigng);
			yield return base.text(" Benevolent decrees.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.benevolent == "evil")
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
		yield return base.text(" : ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.plareigne);
		yield return base.text(" Iron Fist decrees.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
		yield return base.text(" : ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.plbreigne);
		yield return base.text(" Iron Fist decrees.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.players > 2)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
			yield return base.text(" : ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.plcreigne);
			yield return base.text(" Iron Fist decrees.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.players > 3)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
			yield return base.text(" : ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.pldreigne);
			yield return base.text(" Iron Fist decrees.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.players > 4)

			yield return base.text(" : ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.plereigne);

		}

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage139_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Where Duty Lies");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Ah, to be born of noble blood is a very troublesome thing. The townsfolk genuflect in my presence, the local military is willing to accept my generous donations, and the crown feels nearer to me than ever, yet still I am wrenched apart from within. Did my loyalties lay with the state or with myself?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The decision could not rest with me alone, unfortunately. But if my cousins - whom I love so dearly - and I, could combine our interests, the aristocracy would surely take note. Would the region be ruled by a monarchy with a strong, ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("iron fist");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(", crushing opposition and caring little for the welfare of its citizenry? Or would the ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("benevolent");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("rallying of the people serve us best in the end, despite the additional royal scrutiny it would incur?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Perhaps our early actions had already helped confirm our convictions, either way, the time had come to make a decision. For ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(", we knew what was best.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "2PCoWEvent", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "CoWEventb", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("  ");

	{
		yield return base.text("Marvel at your own visage.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("Renew your vigor with a modicum of rage. How could they construct such a ghastly structure in the vague form of an unworthy clod? The thought set my features to crease into an ugly snear. ");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("And yet, set upon by the emotional heft of this abomination, I felt at once reinvigorated. For while love in its most passionate form was known to revive the soul, it is hate which raises the blood to the cheeks and sets the mind to precise action. I spoke a curse so vile I felt the lilacs wilt at the base of the wretched monument and spate upon the ground thrice.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I would have my");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Scientist(s) closest to the Crown without going over. Gain a bonus?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Gain 1VP for each space you have moved forward on the Insanity Track.");
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage142_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Time of War : A Memoir Across Three Generations");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Dear reader, it is with great excitement that I offer this expansive work for your consideration: A recently unearthed, voluminous manuscript – an epic memoir written over the course of three generations. It is a work as monumental and daunting as it is groundbreaking; a glimpse into the inner workings of the true scientific mind. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Upon discovery of these immaculate pages, I, suffering great personal expense, set forth to ensure the general publication and distribution of this important history. It is a work that will perhaps elucidate upon and justify the eccentric reputations of my forebears. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While I admit that I am biased in this appraisal, as it is my own exemplary lineage which is documented, I submit this comprehensive prosopography in as accurate a condition as I can muster. As one will soon attest, it is a chronicle of events of a decidedly fantastical nature, yet my research confirms it to be as true and vital a work as has ever been seen in print. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, I must offer a word of caution to those with weaker constitutions. While these pages hold a brilliant catalogue of achievements, they also boldly depict the setbacks encountered along the journey. Gruesome, grim, and horrifying as they may be, I have included their spine-chilling contents as originally written. As one might expect, in exposing the base components of the universe, we uncover both light and darkness in equal measure. For without darkness, we cannot appreciate the brilliance of the light.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "ATimeofWarIntro", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

		{
			yield return base.text("the scholarly ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("knowledge");
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 2)
		{
			yield return base.text("the bountiful ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("resources");
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 3)
		{
			yield return base.text("the immense ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("wealth");
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("While the squabble was merely a distraction from my most important work, I must admit that I could not control my generous spirit. 		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.rumor6 = "visited";
		yield return base.abort("TakeSides2");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	if (this.Vars.sab1 == 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00108"))
		{
			yield return base.link("The XXX was a worthy target for my most righteous sabotage.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00108", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage146_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.sab2 == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00109"))
		{
			yield return base.link("The XXX was a worthy target for my most righteous sabotage.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00109", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage146_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.sab2 == 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00110"))
		{
			yield return base.link("The XXX was a worthy target for my most righteous sabotage.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00110", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage146_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.sab2 == 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00111"))
		{
			yield return base.link("The XXX was a worthy target for my most righteous sabotage.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00111", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage146_Fragment_5), false));

	yield break;

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("One flick of an electrical switch and the copper fixtures of the device sent me back to the moments before a failed experiment. I soon became acquainted with visitations from myself, even sharing tea with several versions of my person to talk over and revise a particularly difficult thesis. While the process aged me quicker than desired, the ingredients it saved and the excellent conversation proved well worth it.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.timemistake == 2)

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("While I was somewhat disappointed in the lack of chaos, I was ecstatic at the reaction of the university elite. Our decision had such a positive effect on the world, it made the academics positively seethe! Those furrowed brows and anxious worry lines grafted onto their imbecilic faces made the outcome of this rash decision a joy to behold. It wasn't long before this joy gave way to clarity of purpose. I felt reinvigorated, hoping each day that my next experiment would evoke the same horrific response.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

	if (this.Vars.timemistake == 3)

Like all initial fascinations, the wave of interest in manipulating fate slowly gave way to other technological distractions and time machines became popular children's toys around the holidays.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I cannot recollect the moment when I noticed it, perhaps it happened naturally, but as the timeline shifted ever so slowly, it appeared that the forces aligning the cosmos preferred stasis over the whims of chaos. 		yield return base.lineBreak();

	if (this.Vars.timemistake == 4)

			yield return base.text("no effect on gameplay");

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		yield return base.lineBreak();

");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage150_Fragment_0()
{

	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		if (this.Vars.timemistake == 1)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Insanity_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" marker to the starting space. Then, all players gain 1 Compulsion.");
		}
		else if (this.Vars.timemistake == 3)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "ScoreTrackMarker";

		}
		else if (this.Vars.timemistake == 4)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "MFWlogo";
			yield return base.text("Nothing happens. However, the emotions the players feel at this lack of chaos affecting the game is very real, I'm sure.");

		else if (this.Vars.timemistake == 5)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			}

			yield return base.text(" on it. ");
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("If this would cause a player to retreat to the left past the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.figure);
				yield return base.text(" token, they must return a Vanity Estate Upgrade to the supply.");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.timemistake == 6)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMob_Icon";
			yield return base.text("Retrieve the Angry Mob marker and place it on the space on the Creepy Track with the ");

			yield return base.text(" token to the scenario box. The original Angry Mob rules are in effect again. ");

			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
