			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.timemistake == 7)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "S3_CardBack";
			if (this.Vars.platm == "yes")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
				yield return base.text(" must flip their Giant Masterwork face-down.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.plbtm == "yes")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
				yield return base.text(" must flip their Giant Masterwork face-down.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.plctm == "yes")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
				yield return base.text(" must flip their Giant Masterwork face-down.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.pldtm == "yes")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
				yield return base.text(" must flip their Giant Masterwork face-down.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.pletm == "yes")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
				yield return base.text(" must flip their Giant Masterwork face-down.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Any player with a face-down Masterwork can no longer complete it this Generation. ");
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("If you have already completed it, immediately lose an amount of VP equal to the completion value on the front side and gain 3 Resources (ingredient, knowledge, or money) from the supply.");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.timemistake == 8)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "VillageChronicleCover";
			yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("22");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Return the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("In Memoriam");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" upgrade tile to the scenario box. Return the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.figure);
				yield return base.text(" token");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" to the scenario box.");
		}
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage151_Init()
{
	base.Passages["IntroMartial-Monarchists"] = new StoryPassage("IntroMartial-Monarchists", new string[]
	{
		"INTRO"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage151_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage151_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION II: Plagued by Conflict");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If one can call the prospect of perpetual conflict stabilizing, my life settled into a somewhat steady routine. During the day, the sound of distant gunfire rumbled through the halls of my estate as silver plumes of smoke billowed beyond the mountainous horizon, casting tendril-like shadows across the land — a constant reminder of civil war. At night, the rare spectacle of an explosion brightening the sky surprised me with how viscerally I reacted.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Soldiers in their bright regalia keep watch over the town from a newly erected outpost, waving the brilliant orange flag of royalty. The Monarchy had claimed victory from afar after stationing their ranks across the region, but as scuffles remained constant, this declaration was all pomp without substance. The Monarchy drafted citizens into their ranks and levied penalties against those who showed disloyalty.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The inference that one of my standing should owe a debt of servitude to those who already tax my earnings into oblivion was enough to make me spill my tea. And to what end, I wondered? Could peace be mustered in a populace kept so distant from the individuals who ruled it? It was called the industrial revolution for a reason, was it not?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But, I must admit, the safety that the Monarchy afforded appealed to my pocketbook. Appeasing the Monarchy would ensure money and influence, but it also appeared — for better or ill — that royalty was distant enough to take little interest in our experimentations unless they provided direct benefit to themselves, whereas the Separatists were interested in knowledge and were desperate to explore all scientific options available to them to turn the tide. However, their frail sensibilities would not so easily accept my experimentations. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Ah, to be left to one's own devices or to be famously scrutinized, reviled, and revered in equal measure! The decision weighed upon me so heavily it gave me mild indigestion during my evening banquets. What direction should I choose to advance my most important scientific work? ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.iou = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "GUNSAward", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage152_Init()
{
	base.Passages["IntroMartial-Separatists"] = new StoryPassage("IntroMartial-Separatists", new string[]
	{
		"INTRO"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage152_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage152_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION II: Down with the Monarchy");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The length and difficulty of my journey was exacerbated by the ongoing conflict. Compounding this harried inconvenience, my spouse and I suffered the indignity of a lengthy interrogation by soldiers of the Separatist forces, who had imposed an unofficial martial government. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Peasants-turned-soldiers in their motley uniforms keep watch over the town from a newly erected outpost waving a sanguine flag. They spoke of freedom as they dug fresh graves in the cemetery; the wrought iron gates perpetually wreathed in lilies. I observed the daily horse-drawn carts, dragging the wounded towards ill-equipped infirmaries; my crimson reflection in the muddy ruts of unpaved highways.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was both in spite of and because of this brashness that I found myself drawn to the scrappy Separatist upstarts and their eagerness to fight for the capricious whims of the great unwashed. The Separatists were desperate for the advantages that my family's experimentations provided, and while hesitant over our methods, were willing to further our knowledge in return. Unfortunately, this relationship made them more entitled to levy accusations towards us.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, the influence of the throne was still absolute. If one could ingratiate themselves with the distracted Monarchy, their influence and money was on offer. The peasantry would be too discontent to focus on our more \"ambitious\" works. Unfortunately, unless experimentation directly benefited them, the Monarchy had no use for it.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Ah, to be left to one's own devices or to be famously scrutinized, reviled, and revered in equal measure! The decision weighed upon me so heavily that I could scarcely enjoy my afternoon pastries. Neither could the muffled wailing coming from the cellar laboratory nor the distant clattering of gunfire at night calm my weary mind. What direction should I choose to advance my most important scientific work? ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.iou = 0;
	this.Vars.sepevent = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "GUNSAward", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	{

		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Suspicions Confirmed");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("The Unified Monarchists are furious to discover that one of our family has been consorting with the enemy for over a decade. I am adamant in my disapproval of my father's hidden grudge against the current government and I offer them access to all goods within, free of charge. I am forever a proud citizen of this nation and harbor absolutely no ill-feelings, nor grudges which will spitefully fester in my psyche for the remainder of my years.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000153"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000153", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage153_Fragment_0), false));
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.abort("BribeDenied");
		}
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("BribeDenied");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage155_Fragment_3()
{

	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "MonarchReign1";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 17)
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "MonarchReign2";
	}
	else
	{
		ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "MonarchReign3";
	}
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{

		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Lose 3VP");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("discard an Experiment card");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("from your hand back to the supply.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Remove your ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Marker from the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Track and place it on top of your Score Track Marker.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("For the remainder of the game, each time you gain ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("lose 1VP");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("instead.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

		5
	});

			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.abort("Sabotage1Now");
		}
	}
	else if (this.Vars.bldg1 == 0 || this.Vars.bldg1 == "")
	{
		if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Service Required");
			}

			}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage157_Fragment_0()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Sabotage1Now";
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "BuildingS3Barracks";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Any player who did not place a piece on the Barracks this round ");
		if (this.Vars.barrackpen == 1)
		{
			yield return base.text("gains ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
				{
					1,
					2
				}));
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" <sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		else if (this.Vars.barrackpen == 2)
		{
			yield return base.text("receives ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("$1 less");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" income this round.");
		}
		else if (this.Vars.barrackpen == 3)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("must");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" immediately lose ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
				{
					2,
					3
				}));
				yield return base.text("VP");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		else if (this.Vars.barrackpen == 4)
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("must");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" flip their Flag token to the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Separatist");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" side and lose ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("1VP");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(". The Monarchy is not pleased.");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("is fortunate as the Monarchy has decided not to penalize them this round.");
		}
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage158_Main()
{
	this.Vars.barrackpen = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2,
		3,
		4,
		5
	});
	if (this.Vars.bldg1 == "Laborer's Union")
	{
		if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Service Required");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("I was admittedly distressed by the Monarchy's insistence upon military service to help quell the uprising. 			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000015800"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000015800", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage158_Fragment_0), false));
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.abort("Sabotage1Now");
		}
	}
	else if (this.Vars.bldg1 == 0 || this.Vars.bldg1 == "")
	{
		if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Unified Monarchists")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Service Required");
			}

			}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage160_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Choice for Resistance");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I could not be swayed. It was clear that my most moral and proper duty was to oppose tyranny in all forms. Though I shuddered at the means by which this task would be accomplished, I knew first-hand how motivational a force fear could be.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The choice was clear:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00115"))
	{
		yield return base.link("The Barracks was a worthy target for my most righteous sabotage.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00115", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage160_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00116"))
	{
		yield return base.link("The Laborer's Union was a worthy target for my most righteous sabotage.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00116", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage160_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	this.Vars.sabpage = 5;

private void passage161_Init()

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage161_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Demolition for Change");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I penned a letter to my contact within the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.warloser);
	yield return base.text(". The site had been chosen and the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.bldg1);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("would fall, weakening the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
	yield return base.text("' position in the village.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.wardestroy = 1;
	if (this.Vars.round == 7)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "AMessenger", null);
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.warpage2 = 1;
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "ResistEvent", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage172_Main()

	}

	yield return base.text("Because of the rapid expansion of war efforts, stocks of goods were increasingly hard to come by. When a famine struck in 1901, the food shortages caused mass riots. Ideas were thrown about for potential solutions - labor camps for dissidents, re-education facilities, pills that slow the metabolism - but all of these were bandages that did not address the root of the issue.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While I offered it in jest at first, the most clean, efficient, and logical course was to utilize what we now had in droves to offset what we lacked. Were we to simply riddle our enemy's bodies with bullets and let them spoil the soil? Why should we allow perfectly good protein to waste away in the elements?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I decided to convene with my cousins and put the matter to a vote.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("real");
	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "2PFamineBid", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "ATOW-FamineEventV", null);

	yield break;
	yield break;

	yield return base.text("However, intrigue is what I desired. Suspicions, I did not. 	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage174_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Destructive Success");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.teaopt == "Outpost")
	{
		this.Vars.wardestroy = 2;
		this.Vars.sabpage = 8;
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.wardestroy = 1;
		this.Vars.sabpage = 5;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.teaopt);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("was no match for the power of our well-orchestrated combined experimental talents. Did the series of clamorous explosions arouse suspicions? Perhaps. But the fanfare certainly offered the townsfolk new inspiration to rally towards the cause.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.teaopt == "Barracks")
	{
		yield return base.text("With minimal casualties, the Barracks had been turned to rubble. No longer would we be beholden to the tyrannous edict of forced conscription.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000174"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000174", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage174_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

		yield return base.text("My altruistic nature would not allow me to seek revenge on such trivial matters when my great work was primed to change the world. Expectedly, their dubious manners and overt schemes were not well-received by the local officials. It was fortunate that our illustrious grandfather were not here to see this pathetic display. I am sure he is seething in his coffin over it even now!");

private void passage178_Init()

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage178_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Rules of the Duel");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Over the next few days, I formalized the rules of engagement for a duel that would take place as soon as all parties were able. I knew that I could choose a duel of ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("scientific prowess");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("or ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("pistols");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("at twenty paces.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A scientific duel would be a duel where we would compare our research and skill levels in one of four scientific fields to be determined randomly. By adding our total Journal Track levels to our completed Experiments of that type, we would determine the victor! ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A duel with pistols would be a duel where the victor was determined through sheer chance.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The decision was clear to me:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00122"))
	{
		yield return base.link("I chose a battle of wits.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00122", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage178_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00123"))
	{
		yield return base.link("I chose pistols at dawn.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00123", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage178_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Or perhaps, I chose to retract and ");
	yield return base.link("send them a strongly-worded letter.", "DuelDenounce1", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage182_Init()
{
	base.Passages["DuelResolution1"] = new StoryPassage("DuelResolution1", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage182_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage182_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("This and the subsequent passages are revealed and read aloud to all players.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Bloody Business");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As quick as the sun rose above the Carpathian Mountains, the morning of the dreaded duel had arrived. I was eager to settle this business and return home to my laboratory, but not so eager as to miss removing the arrogant smirk from my cousin's lips.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.dueltype == "science")
	{
		yield return base.text("I opened the hatch on my carriage, allowing a fresh plume of acrid smoke to billow into the open, revealing my managerie of scientific equipment. I was ready to conduct some true science!");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("I once again checked the chamber of my pistol, seeing a single polished bullet stationed inside. With a deep breath, I engaged the firing pin with my thumb and holstered the weapon at my side. It was then that I felt the beating of my heart as a chill ran down my spine. I was ready to end this bloody business.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to begin the duel...", "DuelResolution1a", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.dueltype == "science")
	{
		this.Vars.duelsci = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Chemistry",
			"Biology",
			"Occult"
		});
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.duelshot = this.macros1.random(1.0, 5.0);
		if (this.Vars.duelshot < 3)
		{
			this.Vars.duelwinner = this.Vars.sabotagee1;
			this.Vars.duelloser = this.Vars.playersabotage1;
		}
		if (this.Vars.duelshot > 2)
		{
			this.Vars.duelwinner = this.Vars.playersabotage1;
			this.Vars.duelloser = this.Vars.sabotagee1;
		}
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage184_Init()

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage184_Main()
{
	this.Vars.duelresult = this.macros1.random(1.0, 5.0);
	if (this.Vars.duelresult == "1")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("An Unfortunate Death");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Though I felt a tinge of remorse at the sight, my cousin and I were both aware of the fatal risks this bloody confrontation carried with it. I watched spellbound as ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.duelloser);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		if (this.Vars.dueltype == "science")
		{
			if (this.Vars.duelsci == "Engineering")
			{
				yield return base.text("was unceremoniously crushed between two bronze gears. The machine created for this event would need to be disassembled and cleaned before it could be used again.");
			}
			else if (this.Vars.duelsci == "Chemistry")
			{
				yield return base.text("withered into a rubbery scrap of skin, their blood having been accidentally distilled during the duel. Thankfully, the beakers and pipettes involved in the process could still be used after a proper scrubbing.");
			}
			else if (this.Vars.duelsci == "Biology")
			{
				yield return base.text("was mauled and desecrated into an unrecognizable pile of exposed flesh and muscle. Appreciatively, the experiment used in the duel was docile after feeding and easily recaptured.");
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.text("disappeared into a swirling silver vortex, leaving behind only a single hand that attempted to prevent this occurrence by grabbing onto a nearby metal fixture. It wriggled for a few moments before expiring.");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("reeled once before crumpling to the mossy ground. The bullet had hit a major artery that could not be sutured before the loss of blood overwhelmed them. On the more matter-of-fact side, the body that remained was otherwise untouched and was returned to the estate within hours.");
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("As blood pooled beneath them, staining the dueling grounds crimson, I shielded my eyes and fled from the site. The duel had ended in death. The generation would have to continue based solely upon their willed instructions, penned weeks before the lethal event. ");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("As required in the code duello, the matter was now complete, and while personal feelings of injustice may still exist between the parties, this conflict was deemed over.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000018401"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000018401", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage184_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Wounded Pride");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I watched as my opponent, ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.duelloser);
		if (this.Vars.dueltype == "science")
		{
			if (this.Vars.duelsci == "Engineering")
			{
				yield return base.text(" suddenly complained of a strained wrist as their pitiful, makeshift contraption grinded to a halt. They");
			}
			else if (this.Vars.duelsci == "Chemistry")
			{
				yield return base.text(" held the side of their arm where a chemical burn had reddened the skin and");
			}
			else if (this.Vars.duelsci == "Biology")
			{
				yield return base.text(" grimaced, exposing a deep wound in their forearm as the modified falcon under their care flew far into the distance. They");
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.text(" red-faced, turned to a new page in their occult tome and feigned a paper-cut so egregious that they");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text(" burst into tears. Apparently my bullet had struck their shoulder, causing a rip in the fabric and minor cut. Unable to stomach the pain, they");
		}
		yield return base.text(" stumbled to their doctor. While their injuries from the duel were minor, I felt a deep fulfillment in knowing that their insufferable pride had been dealt a cruel blow that morning.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("As required in the code duello, the matter was now complete, and while personal feelings of injustice may still exist between the parties, this conflict was deemed over.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000018403"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000018403", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage184_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage185_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Few Improvements");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I was quick to suggest a few \"enhancements\" to their battery and presented several ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("advanced weaponry");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("schematics which could prove instrumental to victory.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While the rumors of my parent's eccentricities made them hesitant, the promise of support from my lucrative estate proved too much to resist. If I could demonstrate to them the visceral efficacy of my proposal, they promised further investment. An easy task.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000185"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000185", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage185_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.sepinc1 = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"you may gain 1 Servant from Lost and lose 1 <sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>.",
		"you may gain 1 Servant from Lost and gain 1VP."
	});
	this.Vars.sepinc2 = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"you may gain 1 Servant from Lost and 1 Knowledge of your choice.",
		"you may pay $1 to gain 1 Caretaker from Lost."
	});
	this.Vars.sepinc3 = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"you may gain 1 Caretaker from Lost.",
		"you may gain 1 Knowledge of your choice and 1VP."
	});
	this.Vars.moninc3 = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"no bonus.",
		"$1 for your efforts."
	});
	this.Vars.wardetermine = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2
	});
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.defense = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			2,
			3,
			4
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.defense = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			3,
			4,
			5
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.defense = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			4,
			5,
			6
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.defense = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			5,
			6,
			7
		});
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage189_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.barracks == "yes")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Lack of Service Penalty");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("If any player's Caretaker remains on the Barracks at the End of the Generation, they immediately ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("lose 5VP");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 0)
		{
			if (this.Vars.townname == "Paradox")
			{
				this.Vars.war = 1;
			}
			if (this.Vars.townname == "Destruction")
			{
				this.Vars.war = 2;
			}
			if (this.Vars.war == 1)
			{
				yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "Warwarn", null);
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "TowardsWar", null);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "SeedGUNS", null);
		}
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("SeedGUNS");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage190_Main()
{

		yield return base.text("Under Unfortunate Circumstances");
	}

	string arg = "Perform the End of the Generation as normal, but do <b>NOT</b> discard your completed Experiments. Remove all player pieces from the board. Return any unused <sprite=\"S3_SickleToken\" index=0>, <sprite=\"S3_ShieldToken\" index=0>, and <sprite=\"S3_WoodenFigureToken\" index=0> tokens to the Scenario box.";
	Action<string, int> s_OnEndOfGeneration = ViewEndOfGeneration.S_OnEndOfGeneration;
	if (s_OnEndOfGeneration != null)
	{
		s_OnEndOfGeneration(arg, 3);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Today, I write these words in a feeble hand under grievous conditions from a location which I dare not reveal. The circumstances of my departure from my estate will become all too apparent to my next of kin. To be relegated to exile in my final days is a fate I never would have foreseen. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.barracks == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("Unfortunately, the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(" Barracks became a central target of the war effort. While the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(" was able to hold the position, they could not prevent the village from becoming collateral damage on the frontlines of battle.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("Without the support of the Barracks, the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(" were unable to protect the strategically important village from being collateral damage on the frontlines of battle.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But even with my final breath, I am stalwart in my hope that my latest discovery will ensure these very words will be prized by future generations. I am, as ever, a servant to science.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "TimeTravelintro", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	base.Passages["Late2ResB"] = new StoryPassage("Late2ResB", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage196_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage196_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.late == 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Gift of Silence");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("For some reason which was never fully explained to me - I assumed it was my family's willingness to ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("fully and silently collaborate");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" in the past - the villagers were even more jovial and accepting of me continuing the important work left to gather dust for so many years. They even opened their coffers to me.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("It would have been uncouth of me not to accept their generosity despite, and I assure you of this fact, my considerable and self-made wealth.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000196"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000196", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage196_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("WarningWarEnding");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage197_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Future is NOW");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While the journal of my parents was an astonishing discovery in itself, I did not realize that the true revelation would arrive several weeks later when I rifled through the pages willed to me. I suspect that you may assume that my memory had slipped or that I had not been thorough in my studies of those browning pages locked within the cellar laboratory, but I swear by my blood to be true.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I had read over the myriad notes and journal entries so many times that I had memorized their contents, yet one afternoon when I turned to a central page, several pristine and folded pieces of parchment fell to the floor. A faint and acrid scent of burnt oil wafted from the papers, which each detailed a new, amazing schematic for devices far more advanced than any I had ever perceived possible.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000197"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000197", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage197_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.text(this.Vars.figure);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("I so obliviously kept upon my mantle became a topic of conversation around town, becoming a central source of intrigue for my secret work. They began to ask me questions, even as I became more bold and curt with my responses. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, I soon discovered that their sneers weren't sneers of derision, merely appropriate disgust at the necessary but sometimes graphic lengths to which my experimentation perched upon the bleeding edge of innovation. To my surprise, as I began to hold a grotesque exhibition of some of my family's preserved works, the academic response was one of motivation.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Although I could not withhold my vocal disdain for extrinsic motivations - wretched carrots dangled tenuously in front of weaker minds - I also recognized that if I could cause them to react in a fervor, I could expect rapturous applause instead of pitchforks. However, it would take significant effort to do so.");

	}

	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage200_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Time Machine - Publication?");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While the ideas set forth in my parent's journal entries were both outdated and embarrassingly rudimentary in some areas, one thing that the fools in academia hounded us to provide was the schematics to the Time Conveyance Device. For a discovery so radical and immense in its influence on multiple dimensions of the world, the meager sums they offered for entrusting it to their universities was insulting.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I would never give it to them to abuse secretly at their discretion. No! But to publish it widely and allow all of the Hungarian people the chance to rewrite history? That, it seemed, would be the sort of experimental chaos the stuffed shirts at the university would never see coming!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But, perhaps, and most undoubtably, it would have untold repercussions.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The issue at hand, however, was the matter of secrecy. If any one of us - myself or my dear cousins - decided to publish the schematic, it would be freely available.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I knew that each would need to make their own private decision and I prayed that it would be the correct choice.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "MonuA", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage203_Init()
{
	base.Passages["WarningWarEnding"] = new StoryPassage("WarningWarEnding", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage203_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage203_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The War?");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As a brief consideration for those who may read these words and perceive a gap in the narrative of my family's lineage, I will address the period of civil war that was mentioned so often a full generation previous. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Though details about this minor conflict are sparse, I could discern that ");
	if (this.Vars.warwinner == "Separatists")
	{
		yield return base.text("the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(" were able to use public pressure to establish a republican house with only minor skirmishes and rebellions along the way. Working in tandem with a figurehead monarchy, a democratic process was enacted.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Decidedly trivial and woefully boring, I could not understand my family's fascination with the events. Suffice to say, it had minimal effects on my current state.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.warwinner);
		yield return base.text(" were able to quash the minor events of the 1860's and 70's, easing minor taxation grievances and relegating this civil war to a few muckraking, sensationalist headlines in the emerging newspapers.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("In fact, it was so difficult to find materials related to the disagreement that I could not understand my family's fascination with the events. Suffice to say, it had minimal effects on my current affairs.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "WhoopsUtopian", null);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage219_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Failure");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My experiments are not some frivolous diversion for the gossipmongers of ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("to mock as they please! They looked at me as if I were intending to replace the gears in my longcase clock with stock and barrel of a rifle. Are we not creating weapons of war? Why would compounding weaponry with additional weaponry be unnacceptable?");

private void passage229_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MonuRes"] = new StoryPassage("MonuRes", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage229_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage229_Main()
{
	StyleScope styleScope;
	if (this.Vars.release >= 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("A Bend Towards Chaos");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("To hell with academia! I was not afraid of some minor fourth-dimensial tampering. Would it not be immoral to refuse all persons the basic human right to alter their own fate? I would unlock and disperse the secrets of creation no matter what horrors lay before me.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Publishing the means to construct a time machine to the general public was a calculated move that even the most daring polymath wouldn't be brave enough to make. My family would leave an indelible mark on the timeline of the cosmos regardless of the anarchic course that now lay ahead.");
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("A Secure Future");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Bold as it would have been to openly allow the public to source parts and make their own journey through time, the potential time loss was too great to ignore. With the future already at my fingertips, there was no need to ride the waves of chaos. With the precision of a potter molding clay at the wheel, I would design a perfect world.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Because of our decision, the town has seen the brilliance of our vision and will honor the best amongst us appropriately with a special monument.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage229_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

			yield return base.text("SETUP");
		}

				yield return base.text(" gains 3VP.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}

			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
				yield return base.text(" gains 3VP.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}

			{

				yield return base.text(" gains 3VP.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();

			{

				yield return base.text(" gains 3VP.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}

			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
				yield return base.text(" gains 3VP.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();

				yield return base.text(" gains a Compulsion.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();

			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
				yield return base.text(" gains a Compulsion.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.plctm == "yes")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
				yield return base.text(" gains a Compulsion.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.pldtm == "yes")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
				yield return base.text(" gains a Compulsion.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.pletm == "yes")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
				yield return base.text(" gains a Compulsion.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
		}
		if (this.Vars.platm == "no")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
			yield return base.text(" draws 1 Utopian Experiment and gains 1 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");

			yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage235_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB
		}));
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB,
			this.Vars.nameC
		}));
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB,
			this.Vars.nameC,
			this.Vars.nameD
		}));
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB,
			this.Vars.nameC,
			this.Vars.nameD,
			this.Vars.nameE
		}));
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand this storybook device to ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and do not allow any other players to see the screen.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000235"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Once you are ready, click here to reveal your secret conversation.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000235", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage235_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00176"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameA, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00176", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage235_Fragment_2), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00177"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameB, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00177", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage235_Fragment_3), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00178"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameC, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00178", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage235_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00179"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameD, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00179", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage235_Fragment_5), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 4)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00180"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameE, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00180", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage235_Fragment_6), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	yield break;

		}));

	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("tokens to their Quarters. Return the Occult cube to the upper-most available square on the World Conquest card.");

	yield break;

private void passage237_Init()
{
	base.Passages["ATOW-FamineEventYes"] = new StoryPassage("ATOW-FamineEventYes", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage237_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage237_Main()
{
	if (this.ispopup)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		if (this.Vars.players == 2)
		{
			ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("ATOW-FamineEventYes", "Carefully pass the Storybook to the player who won the bid.\nPlease enter the name of the new meat product:", "string", 0.5f);
		}
		else
		{
			ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("ATOW-FamineEventYes", "Carefully pass the Storybook to the player with the most VP.\nPlease enter the name of the new meat product:", "string", 0.5f);
		}
	}
	else if (ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString() != this.Vars.newmeat)
	{
		this.Vars.newmeat = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Modest Proposal");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The riots ceased and a calm set in across the valley. With an influx of fresh, surprisingly tender cuts of ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.newmeat);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("and the introduction of salted, canned ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.newmeat);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("rations, the effort at home and abroad was bolstered immeasurably. Faced with the prospect of starvation, it was startling how readily individuals would not question how a famine could provide such a bounteous wintry season. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000023702"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000023702", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage237_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage242_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Price of Peace");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The wounds of the recent civil war were still raw and the process of rebuilding was not an inexpensive proposition. While I pledged to offer assistance in any way that my humble, self-driven, well-educated mind could, I was quite surprised when they actually had the indecency to act upon this proposal.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The Separatist government enforced ");
	if (this.Vars.wardestroy == 0)
	{
		yield return base.text("no new taxes, thankfully, as zero buildings were sabotaged in the previous generation. At least consistent support for my native country had its benefits.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.wardestroy == 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("a one-time estate inheritance tax of $1 - due to a single building being destroyed - which would go into effect during my early years. While at least it would not rob me of my most precious resource - time - it would sour my mood upon days of leisure.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("a recurring estate tax of $1 - to rebuild several buildings - that would go into effect consistently ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("(at the start of each new round)");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(". While at least it would not rob me of my most precious resource - time - it would sour my mood upon days of leisure.");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "PeaceDiscard", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage243_Init()
{
	base.Passages["FinalBattleComplete"] = new StoryPassage("FinalBattleComplete", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage243_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage243_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Campaign Complete");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.peac == 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("Any players with unused ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" tokens must now discard them to the Scenario box. ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("For every 2 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" tokens");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" returned this way, that player ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("gains 1VP");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("The player with the most remaining ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" tokens gains a Vanity Estate Upgrade of their choice. ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("If there is a tie, all tied players choose and gain an Upgrade in turn order.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("You must still pay the cost to expand your Estate if needed.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to move to Final Scoring...", "Scoring", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.peacecount == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End7";
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End8";
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage244_Init()

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage244_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Royal Advisor");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The player(s) closest to the ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_CrownToken\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("token on the ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("Track without overlapping or exceeding it ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("gains 6VP");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(". ");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("All tied players receive the full VP amount.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "BenevolenceBonus", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.benevolent == "good")
	{
		if (this.Vars.players == 2)
		{
			if (int.Parse(this.Vars.plareigng) > int.Parse(this.Vars.plbreigng))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameA;
			}
			else if (int.Parse(this.Vars.plbreigng) > int.Parse(this.Vars.plareigng))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameB;
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = "Multiple players are tied, so no player";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 3)
		{
			if (this.Vars.plareigng > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.plbreigng, this.Vars.plcreigng))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameA;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.plbreigng > Mathf.Max(new int[]
			{
				this.Vars.plcreigng
			}))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameB;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.plcreigng > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.plareigng, this.Vars.plbreigng))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameC;
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = "Multiple players are tied, so no player";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 4)
		{
			if (this.Vars.plareigng > Mathf.Max(new int[]
			{
				this.Vars.plbreigng,
				this.Vars.plcreigng,
				this.Vars.pldreigng
			}))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameA;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.plbreigng > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.plcreigng, this.Vars.pldreigng))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameB;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.plcreigng > Mathf.Max(new int[]
			{
				this.Vars.pldreigng
			}))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameC;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.pldreigng > Mathf.Max(new int[]
			{
				this.Vars.plbreigng,
				this.Vars.plcreigng,
				this.Vars.plareigng
			}))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameD;
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = "Multiple players are tied, so no player";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.plareigng > Mathf.Max(new int[]
		{
			this.Vars.plbreigng,
			this.Vars.plcreigng,
			this.Vars.pldreigng,
			this.Vars.plereigng
		}))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameA;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.plbreigng > Mathf.Max(new int[]
		{
			this.Vars.plcreigng,
			this.Vars.pldreigng,
			this.Vars.plereigng
		}))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameB;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.plcreigng > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.pldreigng, this.Vars.plereigng))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameC;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.pldreigng > Mathf.Max(new int[]
		{
			this.Vars.plereigng
		}))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameD;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.plereigng > Mathf.Max(new int[]
		{
			this.Vars.plbreigng,
			this.Vars.plcreigng,
			this.Vars.pldreigng,
			this.Vars.plareigng
		}))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameE;
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = "Multiple players are tied, so no player";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.benevolent == "evil")
	{
		if (this.Vars.players == 2)
		{
			if (int.Parse(this.Vars.plareigne) > int.Parse(this.Vars.plbreigne))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameA;
			}
			else if (int.Parse(this.Vars.plbreigne) > int.Parse(this.Vars.plareigne))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameB;
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = "Multiple players are tied, so no player";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 3)
		{
			if (this.Vars.plareigne > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.plbreigne, this.Vars.plcreigne))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameA;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.plbreigne > Mathf.Max(new int[]
			{
				this.Vars.plcreigne
			}))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameB;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.plcreigne > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.plareigne, this.Vars.plbreigne))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameC;
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = "Multiple players are tied, so no player";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 4)
		{
			if (this.Vars.plareigne > Mathf.Max(new int[]
			{
				this.Vars.plbreigne,
				this.Vars.plcreigne,
				this.Vars.pldreigne
			}))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameA;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.plbreigne > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.plcreigne, this.Vars.pldreigne))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameB;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.plcreigne > Mathf.Max(new int[]
			{
				this.Vars.pldreigne
			}))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameC;
			}
			else if (this.Vars.pldreigne > Mathf.Max(new int[]
			{
				this.Vars.plareigne,
				this.Vars.plbreigne,
				this.Vars.plcreigne
			}))
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameD;
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.mostben = "Multiple players are tied, so no player";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.plareigne > Mathf.Max(new int[]
		{
			this.Vars.plbreigne,
			this.Vars.plcreigne,
			this.Vars.pldreigne,
			this.Vars.plereigne
		}))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameA;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.plbreigne > Mathf.Max(new int[]
		{
			this.Vars.plcreigne,
			this.Vars.pldreigne,
			this.Vars.plereigne
		}))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameB;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.plcreigne > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.pldreigne, this.Vars.plereigne))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameC;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.pldreigne > Mathf.Max(new int[]
		{
			this.Vars.plereigne
		}))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameD;
		}
		else if (this.Vars.plereigne > Mathf.Max(new int[]
		{
			this.Vars.plbreigne,
			this.Vars.plcreigne,
			this.Vars.pldreigne,
			this.Vars.plareigne
		}))
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = this.Vars.nameE;
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.mostben = "Multiple players are tied, so no player";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		if (this.Vars.crowncount > 0)
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End6";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End5";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		if (this.Vars.crowncount > 1)
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End6";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End5";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		if (this.Vars.crowncount > 2)
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End6";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End5";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		if (this.Vars.crowncount > 2)
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End6";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End5";
		}
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage248_Main()
{

	{

			yield return base.text("An Old, Failed Sabotage");
		}

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I discovered a thin circular cut in the top portion of the formless wooden carving. Upon tapping it on the edge of a table, the cut revealed what looked like a stopper and the remains of an old adhesive. With one more solid whack, I stumbled backwards and shielded my eyes as a cloud of black powder burst from the interior. A blasting cap?");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Why some individual would plant an explosive device in a crudely whittled container is beyond my understanding! It was too ancient, of course, to actually cause harm, however, I was able to salvage the well-preserved gunpowder for future use.");

		yield return base.lineBreak();

	}

	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage251_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Giant Success");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("And so it is that this chapter of the story has concluded. It is a story that you no doubt have read about countless times in the newspapers or heard with your family while in the sitting room huddled around your radioscope. The ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("immensity");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("of my family's experiment astounds even myself as I crane my neck to look upon it in all its magnificence.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But damn it all, I swear on my name, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.winner);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("IV, that I will use this bit of fame to fuel my ambitions to the stars. Reaching Utopia is not enough; I must aim higher.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.release >= 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("Releasing the Time Machine schematics had surprisingly little effect, or possibly it had an infinite number of consequences, which technically amounts to no effect at all. And if it did have an effect, I would certainly have no knowledge of the effect's effect as the timeline would have already twisted my knowledge of it. Suffice to say, with time travel, as with real life, everything and nothing matters.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("What could be more innovative than a Giant Time Machine or a ");
	yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"Giant Spider Chariot",
		"Giant Love Potion",
		"Giant Teleportation Device"
	}));
	yield return base.text(", you wonder? Why an even BIGGER version, of course! One of tremendous size!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This is not the end; it is only the beginning. My own story still remains to be written, forged into legacy like those before me. I will not stop until the sun is blotted out by the sheer heftiness of my imagination!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE END?");
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage252_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Behind the Curve");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My close friends and family - many of whom I have permanently severed contact with because of their feelings on the matter - have expressed extreme misgivings about the publication of this book. They claim that my macabre fascination with exposing this to the world is unhealthy! ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Some have even derisively labeled this work as pseudoscience, homeopathy, or a drug-induced fever dream, but I say to them, \"who are you to criticize the moon and the stars for being in the sky?\" This work is important! How can they not see it? If anything, these outlandish experiments further prove the relevance of the science that is far better researched, performed, and peer-reviewed after publication in respected journals. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("For while the world may have sped onward at a pace that our scientific contributions could not match, rendering our innovations lame and timid in comparison, I believe that my family's failure to make an impact on a world of the future is an important lesson. Our contributions must be remembered, not for their value to the progress of mankind, but for laying the foundations of the work that others would ignore because of other more viable innovations which they could hone to perfection.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The world may have progressed beyond a need for mad science, but I believe it is this spirit that will define my family's legacy. Even if what they did, does not.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE END?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage255_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Royal Praise");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("After the passing of my beloved parents, who were never able to see what their influence had accomplished, I was able to compile this extended memoir which I have no doubt will be received equitably with my abridgements.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The royalty were pleased with the successes brought about in part by my family. They appreciated the tenacity displayed when they ");
	if (this.Vars.barracks == "yes")
	{
		if (this.Vars.endchange == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text("supported the establishment of an initial barracks and armed stronghold within the region.");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("supported the building of a barracks for the royal government.");
		}
	}
	else if (this.Vars.endchange == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("could not in good conscience create a barracks for the wrong side of the conflict.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("were against the move to establish a costly barracks in a region when the prevailing opinions were so strong.");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("They remained loyal from generation to generation and helped ");
	if (this.Vars.endchange == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("inspire a successful rebellion.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("retain power with no compromises.");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("And when the situation required persuasive tactics, they ");
	if (this.Vars.endchange == "yes")
	{
		if (this.Vars.wardestroy > 0)
		{
			yield return base.text("used destructive tools to orchestrate a sabotage even when it hurt this fair village of ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("negotiated a peaceful transition without the need to destroy portions of the village.");
		}
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("never faltered. Their outspoken fealty deftly retaining power for all these generations.");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	if (this.Vars.benevolent == "good")
	{
		yield return base.text("Their suggestions pressed a positive agenda for the people of the realm. While demonstrably out of character, it allowed for an easy return to power.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("Their suggestions pressed glory for the crown and crown alone, even when it inconvenienced the people.");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("Three generations of service, dedication, and influence.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My own continued story? Why, as of yet I haven't felt the same inclination to follow in my dear progenitors' footsteps. My service, as newly appointed royal advisor, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.winner);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("IV, right-hand to the crown, leaves me dreadfully little time for hobbies. Maybe someday I shall lift a pipette; it is so difficult to know the future.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I now have a passion of a different sort and this competitive chapter is complete. And not a moment too soon; it is time for tea.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE END?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage256_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Tipping the Scales");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;

	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This is a story of three full generations of dedicated service by a proud Hungarian family with a rich history who were then flippantly cast out of their homes to live in exile. And for what? For revealing an uncomfortable truth? For showing that true science has the power to shape worlds and equally crush them within its grasp? My parents ");

	{
		yield return base.text("could not evade the royal scrutiny");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Oh, how I wish I could view the well-kept estate of my youth with its comforting stone walls and ivy-laden iron gates. To gaze out of the northern veranda to the valley and watch the peasants wade through the smog like toads amongst the slough. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But even as I, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.winner);
	yield return base.text(", have tasted the sweetness of victory, I cannot savor it. The war is over. The legacy is severed. Pity me, for I know not what path to trod. I only hope these words spark something within you, dear reader, that you may not share the same fate as I. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE END?");
	yield break;
	yield break;
}
