private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage258_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Local Legend");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I submit this post-script as the fourth generation to take on the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.winner);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("name. The printing costs have already mounted to a sum which I find difficult to manage after the ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("collapse of the war effort");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("and the subsequent reparation policies levied against this country to weaken its ability to muster new troops. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With the inability for leaders to ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("make the difficult and needed decisions");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("to press the war effort forward, the conflict was lost even before it began. ");
	if (this.Vars.peacecount == 1)
	{
		if (this.Vars.peac == 2)
		{
			yield return base.text("I can only hope those lost in the tragic biochemical release will find some solace in the revelation herein of the true source of the attack.");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("While practical in theory, I recognize that the processing of enemy soldiers into consumable goods was an unfortunate practice that potentially renders this work unreadable to some.");
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I am aware of what my lineage represents to the international community, and while I wish to distance myself from the whole affair, I also could not in good conscience allow the manuscripts I unearthed be destroyed. With its release, I hope to show - in all its graphic detail - that not all intentions were negative and that the science still holds true even to this day.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With righteous conviction and humility in my heart, I am forever your servant.   - Dr. ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.winner);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE END?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage259_Main()
{
	this.Vars.ending = "ATOW-End1";
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.winner);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("wrote Memoir in most cases.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.master == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("Ending 3");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("Ending 4");
	}
	yield break;
}

private void passage260_Init()
{
	base.Passages["ATOW-Preparations"] = new StoryPassage("ATOW-Preparations", new string[]
	{

	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage260_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage260_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Preparations");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.players = GLOBALS.playerCount;
	this.Vars.nameA = GLOBALS.nameA;
	this.Vars.nameB = GLOBALS.nameB;
	if (this.Vars.players > 2)
	{
		this.Vars.nameC = GLOBALS.nameC;
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 3)
	{
		this.Vars.nameD = GLOBALS.nameD;
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 4)
	{
		this.Vars.nameE = GLOBALS.nameE;
	}
	this.Vars.townname = GLOBALS.townName;
	this.Vars.playtxt = ((this.Vars.players == 2) ? "two" : ((this.Vars.players == 3) ? "three" : ((this.Vars.players == 4) ? "four" : ((this.Vars.players == 5) ? "five" : "two"))));
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Complete the standard setup for ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("players as shown in the rulebook. ");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Note that the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Track and starting player will be set by the Storybook in the coming pages.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("<align=\"center\">");
	yield return base.text("<line-height=400%>");
	yield return base.text("<size=200>");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"ScenarioBox3D_War\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text("</size>");
	yield return base.text("</align>");
	yield return base.text("</line-height>");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Then, retrieve the ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Time of War");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("Scenario box, which will contain all components needed for this story. As the Storybook progresses, it will ask you to put items into play from this box. Be sure to keep it nearby.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "ForewordScen2", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.text("Rules");
	}
	styleScope = null;

	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("remain silent");
	}
	styleScope = null;

	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("gain 2 Resources ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("(Knowledge or Ingredients)");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("of their choice at the start of the next Generation.");
	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("accuse");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("one another of traitorous activity, they both must ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("discard 2 Resources");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("of any type from their Estate or ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("return a Servant to Lost");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(".");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If one player accuses and the other remains silent, the player who remains silent must ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("immediately discard one Estate Upgrade from their Estate and gains 2 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("If they do not have an Estate Upgrade built, they must instead lose 5VP.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "Blame1", null);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage263_Main()
{

	{

	}

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("YAY");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("vote is a vote to rule with ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("benevolence");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(". It will reward choices that aid the people or move the ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_CrownToken\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("to the LEFT.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("NAY");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("vote is a vote to rule with an ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("iron fist");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(". It will reward greedy choices that hurt the people or decrees that move the ");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_CrownToken\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("to the RIGHT.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

		yield return base.text("VP");
	}

	yield return base.text(" ");

	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("helped");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("or ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("hurt");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("the people. ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("This includes decrees that have already been made.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A tied vote will result in ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("benevolence");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("being chosen.");
	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.link("Click here to begin the vote...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000263", HarloweEnchantCommand.None, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage263_Fragment_0), false));
	}

	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	{

		4,
		5,
		6,
		7,
		8,
		9,
		10,

		12,
		13,
		14
	});

	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.genericr
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.gen1 = this.Vars.genericr["1st"];
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.gen2 = this.Vars.genericr["2nd"];
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		this.Vars.ch1 = "Gain $3";
	}

	if (this.Vars.gen1 == 2)
	{

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.advise = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.advise
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.reigning = this.Vars.advise["1st"];
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.advisorcount = int.Parse(this.Vars.advisorcount) + 1;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigning == 1)
	{
		yield return base.abort("Reign1");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigning == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.r2 = 1;
		yield return base.abort("Reign2");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigning == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.r3 = 1;
		yield return base.abort("Reign3");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigning == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.r4 = 1;
		yield return base.abort("Reign4");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigning == 6)
	{
		this.Vars.r6 = 1;
		yield return base.abort("Reign6");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigning == 7)
	{
		this.Vars.r7 = 1;
		yield return base.abort("Reign7");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigning == 8)
	{
		this.Vars.r8 = 1;
		yield return base.abort("Reign8");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.text("Both players take all their money into their hands. They then secretly choose any amount to place into their right hand to bid.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Once both players are ready, reveal the amount of money bid simultaneously. The winning player will gain ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("4VP");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("and the right to choose whether to sabotage the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.teaopt);
	yield return base.text(".");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A tied vote will result in no player winning the bid and ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("the ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.teaopt);
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("being kept safe.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Only the player who wins the election must pay their bid to the supply. The other returns their money to their Estate.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000000290"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to start the bid.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000000290", HarloweEnchantCommand.None, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage290_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage293_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("BRIBE");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Region Needs Convincing");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("All players take their money into their hands. Players secretly choose any amount to place into their right hand to add to the total bribe fund.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Once all players are ready, reveal the amount of money simultaneously.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The Military requires ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("$");
		if (this.Vars.players == 2)
		{
			this.Vars.milit = int.Parse(this.macros1.random(0.0, 2.0)) + 1;
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 3)
		{
			this.Vars.milit = int.Parse(this.macros1.random(0.0, 4.0)) + 2;
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 4)
		{
			this.Vars.milit = int.Parse(this.macros1.random(1.0, 4.0)) + 2;
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 5)
		{
			this.Vars.milit = int.Parse(this.macros1.random(1.0, 5.0)) + 2;
		}
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.milit);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("total");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("from all players in order for our bribe to be successful. ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("If our bribe is successful");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(", we will be able to ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("substitute a ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_WeaponToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token for a single Ingredient when performing Experiments");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(". ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("If successful, ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("all");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("money contributed by the players will be returned to the supply. If unsuccessful, the players keep any money contributed.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click here to start the bribe...", "MartialSepEventb", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage299_Init()

	{
		"revised"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage299_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage299_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand the Storybook to ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.reigntemp);
		yield return base.text(". This passage is then read aloud to all players.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Royal ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Decision",
			"Dilemma",
			"Conundrum"
		}));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"After a brief dinner,",
		"With some rejuvenating spirits and food in our bellies,",
		"I easily ingratiated myself into the man's inner circle with a gentle financial nudge. Soon,"
	}));
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("the royal advisor confided in me that he felt somewhat stifled by what he deemed \"insignificant matters of this region.\" I, of course, offered to aide in his endeavors.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was only proper that my assistance would result in a boon for my own ventures. In fact, the precise decision I made had very little effect on the region itself insomuch that I cannot recall what it was. The most important question was, would benevolence or cruelty serve me best?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The choice became clear to me after a momentary deliberation. I chose:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000029901"))
	{
		yield return base.link("I took the side of the people.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000029901", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage299_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" This will result in: " + this.Vars.crownL + " " + this.Vars.ch1);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000029902"))
	{
		yield return base.link("To hell with the people.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000029902", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage299_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" This will result in: " + this.Vars.crownR + " " + this.Vars.ch2);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage299_Fragment_0()
{
	this.Vars.rc = 1;
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		this.Vars.plareigng = this.Vars.plareigng + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.plbreigng = this.Vars.plbreigng + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.plcreigng = this.Vars.plcreigng + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.pldreigng = this.Vars.pldreigng + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.plereigng = this.Vars.plereigng + 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("Reign1b");
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage299_Fragment_1()
{
	this.Vars.rc = 2;
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		this.Vars.plareigne = this.Vars.plareigne + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.plbreigne = this.Vars.plbreigne + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.plcreigne = this.Vars.plcreigne + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.pldreigne = this.Vars.pldreigne + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.plereigne = this.Vars.plereigne + 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("Reign1b");
	yield break;
}

private void passage300_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Reign1b"] = new StoryPassage("Reign1b", new string[]
	{
		"revised"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage300_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage300_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Thanks from the Advisor");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The advisor thanked me for the assistance. From our short conversation, I knew that my friend was quite put upon by decision-making processes. I was quite certain that he would do as I suggested as contemplation would only waste time that could be better spent ");
	yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"waxing his mustache.",
		"adjusting his girdle.",
		"sampling wine and cheese."
	}));
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000300"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000300", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage300_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage300_Fragment_0()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = ((this.Vars.round == 16) ? "MonarchReign1" : ((this.Vars.round == 17) ? "MonarchReign2" : "MonarchReign3"));
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "MFWlogo";
		if (this.Vars.rc == 1)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.crownL);
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.ch1);
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.crownR);
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.ch2);
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Reminder: The ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_CrownToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token can only move into numbered spaces on the track. If a movement would cause it to move into the start or end space, this movement is ignored.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	}

	}

	{
		this.Vars.plbreigne = this.Vars.plbreigne + 1;

	{
		this.Vars.plcreigne = this.Vars.plcreigne + 1;

	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.plereigne = this.Vars.plereigne + 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("Reign7c");
	yield break;
}

private void passage306_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Reign8"] = new StoryPassage("Reign8", new string[]
	{

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage306_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand the Storybook to ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.reigntemp);
		yield return base.text(". This passage is then read aloud to all players.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Weapon Technology");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The war had taken its toll upon the landscape and as time began to mend the rift between the general populace and the royalty, the subject of Advanced Weaponry (spearheaded by our illustrious family) and if it would be available to the common folk became a new topic of conversation. A topic that my dear royal advisor was pressed upon to make decisive action.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The question had little significance to me. I would find a way to benefit from their continued use and improvement either way.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The choice was obvious to me. I chose:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000030600"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Legalize their sale.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000030600", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage306_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text("<i>This will result in: ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.crownL);
	yield return base.text(" Gain 1 Weapon token. Weapon tokens can be spent as money. $1 per Weapon token.</i>");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000030601"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Restrict their sale.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000030601", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage306_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text("<i>This will result in: ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.crownR);
	yield return base.text(" Gain 1 Weapon token. Weapon tokens are worth 1VP at Game End.</i>");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage306_Fragment_0()
{
	this.Vars.rc = 1;
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		this.Vars.plareigng = this.Vars.plareigng + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.plbreigng = this.Vars.plbreigng + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.plcreigng = this.Vars.plcreigng + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.pldreigng = this.Vars.pldreigng + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.plereigng = this.Vars.plereigng + 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("Reign8b");
	yield break;
}

		{

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("animal token");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" and return it to the game box. This animal can be in the possession of another player.");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.crownR);
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.ch2);
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			yield return base.text("Reminder: The ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_CrownToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token can only move into numbered spaces on the track. If a movement would cause it to move into the start or end space, this movement is ignored.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage312_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Reign7c"] = new StoryPassage("Reign7c", new string[]
	{
		"revised"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage312_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage312_Main()
{
	if (this.ispopup)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("Reign7c", "Please enter your brand new Regal title.", "string", 0.1f);
	}
	if (ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString() != this.Vars.title)
	{
		this.Vars.title = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString();
		Debug.Log("password check : " + this.Vars.title);
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		if (this.Vars.title != 0 && this.Vars.title != "")
		{
			this.Vars.nameA = this.Vars.title + " " + this.Vars.nameA;
		}
		this.Vars.reigntemp = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		if (this.Vars.title != 0 && this.Vars.title != "")
		{
			this.Vars.nameB = this.Vars.title + " " + this.Vars.nameB;
		}
		this.Vars.reigntemp = this.Vars.nameB;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		if (this.Vars.title != 0 && this.Vars.title != "")
		{
			this.Vars.nameC = this.Vars.title + " " + this.Vars.nameC;
		}
		this.Vars.reigntemp = this.Vars.nameC;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		if (this.Vars.title != 0 && this.Vars.title != "")
		{
			this.Vars.nameD = this.Vars.title + " " + this.Vars.nameD;
		}
		this.Vars.reigntemp = this.Vars.nameD;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.reigntemp == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		if (this.Vars.title != 0 && this.Vars.title != "")
		{
			this.Vars.nameE = this.Vars.title + " " + this.Vars.nameE;
		}
		this.Vars.reigntemp = this.Vars.nameE;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.abort("Reign7c2");
	yield break;
}

{
	base.Passages["Reign7c2"] = new StoryPassage("Reign7c2", new string[]
	{
		"revised"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage313_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage313_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Thank You, ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.reigntemp);
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The advisor, when he regained his sense, thanked me for the assistance. I thrice reminded him to refer to me as ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.reigntemp);
	yield return base.text(". Ah, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.reigntemp);
	yield return base.text(". Such a glorious title!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000313"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000313", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage313_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage313_Fragment_0()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = ((this.Vars.round == 16) ? "MonarchReign1" : ((this.Vars.round == 17) ? "MonarchReign2" : "MonarchReign3"));
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "MFWlogo";
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.crownR);
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Reminder: The ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S3_CrownToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token can only move into numbered spaces on the track. If a movement would cause it to move into the start or end space, this movement is ignored.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

{
	base.Passages["Reign7b"] = new StoryPassage("Reign7b", new string[]
	{

	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage314_Main));
}

		yield return base.text("Delayed Thanks");

	yield return base.text("The advisor, when he resumed consciousness, thanked me for the assistance. I informed him that the business was secured and the people would be overjoyed with his decisiveness. ");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000314"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000314", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage314_Fragment_0), false));
	}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage1008_Init()

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage1008_Main()
{
	this.Vars.winner = GLOBALS.winnerName;
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.abort(this.Vars.ending);
	yield break;
}

private void passage315_Init()
{
	base.Passages["SeedResolution"] = new StoryPassage("SeedResolution", new string[]
	{
		"revised"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage315_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage315_Main()
{
	StyleScope styleScope;
	if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("A Place of Knowledge");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I watched from my clandestine position as a singular corner in the secret laboratory became a storage place for various notes and torn pages from old manuscripts. With each passing evening, this obsessive collection of knowledge spilled onto the stone floors and tacked up on the walls like an artist's studio, spreading across the room like brown leaves on a brilliant vine. Such a wealth of knowledge, the likes of which I had never witnessed in all of my years at university.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Soon, it was impossible for ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
		yield return base.text(" to ignore the genius that existed just outside its very limits. The region would be celebrated for the <b>knowledge</b> my family had brought to it, and I savored the victory from the shadows, knowing I would reap all the benefits.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("A Wealth of Goods");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Ingredients lay stacked in haphazard piles along the stone floor of the laboratory. The estate grounds were well-grazed by the exotic display of zoological treats my parents collected. It was difficult to maintain my secretive ruse as an oblivious family member with such a wealth of potential hiding just below my feet. It was a magnificent sight.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Soon, it was impossible for ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
		yield return base.text(" to ignore the genius that existed just outside its very limits. The region would be celebrated for the <b>goods</b> my family had brought to it, and I savored the victory from the shadows, knowing I would reap all the benefits.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("An Investor's Paradise");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Even in their sunset years, my parents operated their business interests with a voracity - and veracity - that could only be seen to be believed. If I can be perfectly quaint, the glitter of coin held little interest to me, yet the wondrous things which I could procure with it certainly reignited the fires of ambition within me as my hair grew ever ashen.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Soon, it was impossible for ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
		yield return base.text(" to ignore the genius that existed just outside its very limits. The region would be celebrated for the <b>money</b> my family had brought to it, and I savored the victory from the shadows, knowing I would reap all the benefits.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00000315"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00000315", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage315_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage315_Fragment_0()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "BlameGameEvent";
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "CompulsionBack";
		if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 1)
		{
			yield return base.text("The player with the Storybook token on their Estate ");
			yield return base.text("<b>gains 1 Knowledge cube of their choice</b> and <b>gains a Compulsion</b>. Then, return the Storybook token to the supply.");
		}
		else if (this.Vars.gunsbonus == 2)
		{
			yield return base.text("The player with the Storybook token on their Estate <b>gains 1 Ingredient of their choice</b> and <b>gains a Compulsion</b>. Then, return the Storybook token to the supply.");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("The player with the Storybook token on their Estate gains <b>gains $2</b> and <b>gains a Compulsion</b>. Then, return the Storybook token to the supply.");
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}
